trans-unit.resname: LTC·1 | Éowyn, Shieldmaiden | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Éowyn, Shieldmaiden
trans-unit.target: 执盾女战士伊奥温

trans-unit.resname: LTC·1 | Éowyn, Shieldmaiden | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: First strike\nAt the beginning of combat on your turn, if another Human entered the battlefield under your control this turn, create two 2/2 red Human Knight creature tokens with trample and haste. Then if you control six or more Humans, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 先攻 在你回合的战斗开始时，若本回合中有另一个人类在你的操控下进战场，则派出两个2/2红色，具践踏与敏捷异能的人类／骑士衍生生物。然后如果你操控六个或更多人类，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·2 | Frodo, Adventurous Hobbit | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Frodo, Adventurous Hobbit
trans-unit.target: 雄心霍比特人弗罗多

trans-unit.resname: LTC·2 | Frodo, Adventurous Hobbit | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Partner with Sam, Loyal Attendant\nVigilance\nWhenever CARDNAME attacks, if you gained 3 or more life this turn, the Ring tempts you. Then if Frodo is your Ring-bearer and the Ring has tempted you two or more times this game, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 与忠诚随员山姆拍档 警戒 每当CARDNAME攻击时，若你本回合中获得过3点或更多生命，则魔戒引诱你。然后如果弗罗多是你的持戒人，且本盘游戏中魔戒已引诱你两次或更多，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·3 | Galadriel, Elven-Queen | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Galadriel, Elven-Queen
trans-unit.target: 精灵女王加拉德瑞尔

trans-unit.resname: LTC·3 | Galadriel, Elven-Queen | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Will of the council — At the beginning of combat on your turn, if another Elf entered the battlefield under your control this turn, starting with you, each player votes for dominion or guidance. If dominion gets more votes, the Ring tempts you, then you put a +1/+1 counter on your Ring-bearer. If guidance gets more votes or the vote is tied, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 议定～在你回合的战斗开始时，若本回合中有另一个妖精在你的操控下进战场，则由你开始，每位牌手各投票选择「占有」或「指引」。若占有票数较多，则魔戒引诱你，然后你在你的持戒人上放置一个+1/+1指示物。若指引票数较多或两者同为最多，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·4 | Sauron, Lord of the Rings | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sauron, Lord of the Rings
trans-unit.target: 魔戒之主索隆

trans-unit.resname: LTC·4 | Sauron, Lord of the Rings | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When you cast this spell, amass Orcs 5, mill five cards, then return a creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.\nTrample\nWhenever a commander an opponent controls dies, the Ring tempts you.
trans-unit.target: 当你施放此咒语时，囤兵半兽人5，磨五张牌，然后将一张生物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。 践踏 每当一个由对手操控的指挥官死去时，魔戒引诱你。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·5 | Aragorn, King of Gondor | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Aragorn, King of Gondor
trans-unit.target: 刚铎国王阿拉贡

trans-unit.resname: LTC·5 | Aragorn, King of Gondor | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Vigilance, lifelink\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.\nWhenever Aragorn attacks, up to one target creature can't block this turn. If you're the monarch, creatures can't block this turn.
trans-unit.target: 警戒，系命 当CARDNAME进战场时，你成为君主。 每当阿拉贡攻击时，至多一个目标生物本回合不能进行阻挡。若你是君主，则生物本回合都不能进行阻挡。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·5 | Aragorn, King of Gondor | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "In this place will I abide, and my heirs, unto the ending of the world."
trans-unit.target: 「我将永居此处，传承后嗣，直至世界终结。」

trans-unit.resname: LTC·6 | Gandalf, Westward Voyager | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Gandalf, Westward Voyager
trans-unit.target: 西行旅者甘道夫

trans-unit.resname: LTC·6 | Gandalf, Westward Voyager | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a spell with mana value 5 or greater, each opponent reveals the top card of their library. If any of those cards shares a card type with that spell, copy that spell, you may choose new targets for the copy, and each opponent draws a card. Otherwise, you draw a card. (A copy of a permanent spell becomes a token.)
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放法术力值等于或大于5的咒语时，每位对手各展示其牌库顶牌。若其中任一牌与该咒语具共通的牌张类别，则复制该咒语，你可以为复制品选择新的目标，且每位对手各抓一张牌。若否，则你抓一张牌。（永久物咒语的复制品会成为衍生物。）

trans-unit.source: Partner with Frodo, Adventurous Hobbit (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Frodo into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)\nAt the beginning of combat on your turn, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")\nActivated abilities of Foods you control cost {1} less to activate.
trans-unit.target: 与雄心霍比特人弗罗多拍档（当此生物进战场时，目标牌手可以将弗罗多从其牌库置于其手上，然后洗牌。） 在你回合的战斗开始时，派出一个食品衍生物。（它是具有「{2}，{T}，牺牲此神器：你获得3点生命」的神器。） 由你操控的食品之起动式异能减少{1}来起动。

trans-unit.target: 每当你施放非生物咒语时，囤兵半兽人X，X为该咒语的法术力值。（在一个由你操控的军队上放置X个+1/+1指示物。它也是半兽人。如果你未操控军队，则先派出一个0/0黑色半兽人／军队衍生生物。） 由你操控的鬼怪和半兽人具有守护{2}。

trans-unit.source: Over all his works a dark smoke hung and wrapped itself about the sides of Orthanc.
trans-unit.target: 在他建造的这一切上空，有一团黑烟萦绕不去，紧紧包在欧尔桑克周围。

trans-unit.target: 连击 CARDNAME进战场时上面有数个+1/+1指示物，其数量等同于由你操控之其他人类的数量。 当伊奥梅尔进战场时，目标牌手成为君主。伊奥梅尔对任意一个目标造成等同于前者力量的伤害。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·53 | Erestor of the Council | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Erestor of the Council
trans-unit.target: 白道会的埃芮斯托

trans-unit.resname: LTC·53 | Erestor of the Council | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever players finish voting, each opponent who voted for a choice you voted for creates a Treasure token. You scry X, where X is the number of opponents who voted for a choice you didn't vote for. Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当所有牌手完成投票时，每位投票选择你投票之选项的对手各派出一个珍宝衍生物。你占卜X，X为投票选择你未投票之选项的对手数量。抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·53 | Erestor of the Council | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "There are but two courses: to hide the Ring forever; or to unmake it."
trans-unit.target: 「这样就只剩下两条路了：要么将魔戒永远藏匿；要么就将它销毁。」

trans-unit.resname: LTC·54 | Faramir, Steward of Gondor | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Faramir, Steward of Gondor
trans-unit.target: 刚铎宰相法拉米尔

trans-unit.resname: LTC·54 | Faramir, Steward of Gondor | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever a legendary creature with mana value 4 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, you become the monarch.\nAt the beginning of your end step, if you're the monarch, create two 1/1 white Human Soldier creature tokens.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个法术力值等于或大于4的传奇生物在你操控下进战场时，你成为君主。 在你的结束步骤开始时，若你是君主，则派出两个1/1白色人类／士兵衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·54 | Faramir, Steward of Gondor | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The last Steward of Gondor begs leave to surrender his office."
trans-unit.target: 「刚铎最后一任宰相请求交还职权。」

trans-unit.resname: LTC·55 | Farmer Cotton | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Farmer Cotton
trans-unit.target: 农夫科顿

trans-unit.resname: LTC·55 | Farmer Cotton | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create X 1/1 white Halfling creature tokens and X Food tokens. (They're artifacts with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，派出X个1/1白色半身人衍生生物和X个食品衍生物。（它们是具有「{2}，{T}，牺牲此神器：你获得3点生命」的神器。）

trans-unit.resname: LTC·55 | Farmer Cotton | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "So it's begun at last! I've been itching for trouble all this year."
trans-unit.target: 「终于开始了！我这一整年总想着闹上一场。」

trans-unit.resname: LTC·56 | Forth Eorlingas! | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Forth Eorlingas!
trans-unit.target: 埃奥尔勇往直前！

trans-unit.resname: LTC·56 | Forth Eorlingas! | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Create X 2/2 red Human Knight creature tokens with trample and haste.\nWhenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to one or more players this turn, you become the monarch.
trans-unit.target: 派出X个2/2红色，具践踏与敏捷异能的人类／骑士衍生生物。 本回合中，每当由你操控的一个或数个生物对一位或多位牌手造成战斗伤害时，你成为君主。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·56 | Forth Eorlingas! | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "A sword-day, a red day, ere the sun rises! Ride now, ride now! Ride to Gondor!"
trans-unit.target: 「举剑拼杀，浴血奋战，直至旭日重生！ 翻身策马，翻身策马！策马奔赴刚铎！」

trans-unit.resname: LTC·57 | Gríma, Saruman's Footman | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Gríma, Saruman's Footman
trans-unit.target: 萨茹曼听差格里马

trans-unit.resname: LTC·57 | Gríma, Saruman's Footman | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can't be blocked.\nWhenever Gríma deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles cards from the top of their library until they exile an instant or sorcery card. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost. Then that player puts the exiled cards that weren't cast this way on the bottom of their library in a random order.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME不能被阻挡。 每当格里马对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，该牌手从其牌库顶开始放逐牌，直到放逐一张瞬间或法术牌为止。你可以施放该牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。然后该牌手将所有以此法放逐且未施放的牌以随机顺序置于其牌库底。

trans-unit.target: 至尊魔戒锢余众

trans-unit.resname: LTC·58 | In the Darkness Bind Them | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after IV.)\nI, II, III — Create a 3/3 black Wraith creature token with menace. The Ring tempts you.\nIV — For each opponent, gain control of up to one target creature that player controls until end of turn. Untap those creatures. They gain haste until end of turn. The Ring tempts you.
trans-unit.target: （于此传纪进战场时及于你抓牌步骤后，加一个学问指示物。到IV后牺牲之。） I, II, III — 派出一个3/3黑色，具威慑异能的鬼魂衍生生物。魔戒引诱你。 IV — 为每位对手各进行以下流程～获得至多一个目标由该牌手操控的生物之操控权直到回合结束。重置这些生物。它们获得敏捷异能直到回合结束。魔戒引诱你。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·59 | Lidless Gaze | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Exile the top card of each player's library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards, and mana of any type can be spent to cast them.\nFlashback {2}{B}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
trans-unit.target: 放逐每位牌手的牌库顶牌。直到你下一个回合的回合结束，你可以使用这些牌，且能用任意种类的法术力来施放。 返照{2}{B}{R}（你可以从你坟墓场中施放此牌，并支付其返照费用，然后将它放逐。）

trans-unit.source: Flying\nWraiths you control have protection from Ring-bearers.\nWhenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, create a 3/3 black Wraith creature token with menace. Then if you control nine or more Wraiths, Wraiths you control have base power and toughness 9/9 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 由你操控的鬼魂具有反持戒人保护异能。 每当你施放瞬间或法术咒语时，派出一个3/3黑色，具威慑异能的鬼魂衍生生物。然后若你操控九个或更多鬼魂，则由你操控的鬼魂之基础力量与防御力为9/9直到回合结束。

trans-unit.target: 议定～由你开始，每位牌手各投票选择「返乡」或「启程」。若返乡票数较多，则每位牌手各将至多两张牌从其坟墓场移回其手上，然后你放逐CARDNAME。若启程票数较多或两者同票，则每位牌手各可以弃掉其手牌并抓七张牌。

trans-unit.target: 团结模范

trans-unit.resname: LTC·78 | Model of Unity | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever players finish voting, you and each opponent who voted for a choice you voted for may scry 2.\n{T}: Add one mana of any color.
trans-unit.target: 每当所有牌手完成投票时，你和每位投票选择你投票之选项的对手各可以占卜2。 {T}：加一点任意颜色的法术力。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·78 | Model of Unity | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Rivendell is a perfect house, whether you like food or sleep or storytelling or singing, or a pleasant mixture of them all."\n—Bilbo
trans-unit.target: 「幽谷就像一所完美的房子，无论你是想吃饭、睡觉、说书、歌唱还是这些都混在一起，它都是最理想的去处。」 ～比尔博

trans-unit.target: 索隆遗宝

trans-unit.resname: LTC·79 | Relic of Sauron | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add two mana in any combination of {U}, {B}, and/or {R}.\n{3}, {T}: Draw two cards, then discard a card.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加两点法术力，且为{U}，{B}和／或{R}的任意组合。 {3}，{T}：抓两张牌，然后弃一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·79 | Relic of Sauron | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: While the power of Sauron grew, light and living things forsook his borders.
trans-unit.target: 随着索隆的力量逐渐壮大，光明与活物便离开了他的地界。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·80 | The Black Gate | Card Name
trans-unit.source: The Black Gate
trans-unit.target: 黑门

trans-unit.resname: LTC·80 | The Black Gate | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may pay 3 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {B}.\n{1}{B}, {T}: Choose a player with the most life or tied for most life. Target creature can't be blocked by creatures that player controls this turn.
trans-unit.target: 于CARDNAME进战场时，你可以支付3点生命。如果你未如此作，则它须横置进战场。 {T}：加{B}。 {1}{B}，{T}：选择一位总生命最高或与他者同为最高的牌手。目标生物本回合不能被由该牌手操控的生物阻挡。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·85 | Aragorn, King of Gondor | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Aragorn, King of Gondor
trans-unit.target: 刚铎国王阿拉贡

trans-unit.resname: LTC·85 | Aragorn, King of Gondor | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Vigilance, lifelink\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.\nWhenever Aragorn attacks, up to one target creature can't block this turn. If you're the monarch, creatures can't block this turn.
trans-unit.target: 警戒，系命 当CARDNAME进战场时，你成为君主。 每当阿拉贡攻击时，至多一个目标生物本回合不能进行阻挡。若你是君主，则生物本回合都不能进行阻挡。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·85 | Aragorn, King of Gondor | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "In this place will I abide, and my heirs, unto the ending of the world."
trans-unit.target: 「我将永居此处，传承后嗣，直至世界终结。」

trans-unit.resname: LTC·86 | Éowyn, Shieldmaiden | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Éowyn, Shieldmaiden
trans-unit.target: 执盾女战士伊奥温

trans-unit.resname: LTC·86 | Éowyn, Shieldmaiden | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: First strike\nAt the beginning of combat on your turn, if another Human entered the battlefield under your control this turn, create two 2/2 red Human Knight creature tokens with trample and haste. Then if you control six or more Humans, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 先攻 在你回合的战斗开始时，若本回合中有另一个人类在你的操控下进战场，则派出两个2/2红色，具践踏与敏捷异能的人类／骑士衍生生物。然后如果你操控六个或更多人类，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·87 | Frodo, Adventurous Hobbit | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Frodo, Adventurous Hobbit
trans-unit.target: 雄心霍比特人弗罗多

trans-unit.resname: LTC·87 | Frodo, Adventurous Hobbit | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Partner with Sam, Loyal Attendant\nVigilance\nWhenever CARDNAME attacks, if you gained 3 or more life this turn, the Ring tempts you. Then if Frodo is your Ring-bearer and the Ring has tempted you two or more times this game, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 与忠诚随员山姆拍档 警戒 每当CARDNAME攻击时，若你本回合中获得过3点或更多生命，则魔戒引诱你。然后如果弗罗多是你的持戒人，且本盘游戏中魔戒已引诱你两次或更多，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·88 | Galadriel, Elven-Queen | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Galadriel, Elven-Queen
trans-unit.target: 精灵女王加拉德瑞尔

trans-unit.resname: LTC·88 | Galadriel, Elven-Queen | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Will of the council — At the beginning of combat on your turn, if another Elf entered the battlefield under your control this turn, starting with you, each player votes for dominion or guidance. If dominion gets more votes, the Ring tempts you, then you put a +1/+1 counter on your Ring-bearer. If guidance gets more votes or the vote is tied, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 议定～在你回合的战斗开始时，若本回合中有另一个妖精在你的操控下进战场，则由你开始，每位牌手各投票选择「占有」或「指引」。若占有票数较多，则魔戒引诱你，然后你在你的持戒人上放置一个+1/+1指示物。若指引票数较多或两者同为最多，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·89 | Gandalf, Westward Voyager | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Gandalf, Westward Voyager
trans-unit.target: 西行旅者甘道夫

trans-unit.resname: LTC·89 | Gandalf, Westward Voyager | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a spell with mana value 5 or greater, each opponent reveals the top card of their library. If any of those cards shares a card type with that spell, copy that spell, you may choose new targets for the copy, and each opponent draws a card. Otherwise, you draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放法术力值等于或大于5的咒语时，每位对手各展示其牌库顶牌。若其中任一牌与该咒语具共通的牌张类别，则复制该咒语，你可以为复制品选择新的目标，且每位对手各抓一张牌。若否，则你抓一张牌。

由你操控的鬼怪和半兽人具有守护{2}。

trans-unit.target: 袋底洞保护者洛比莉亚

trans-unit.resname: LTC·110 | Lobelia, Defender of Bag End | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
When Lobelia enters the battlefield, look at the top card of each opponent's library and exile those cards face down.
{T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Choose one —
• Until end of turn, you may play a card exiled with Lobelia without paying its mana cost.
• Each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 当洛比莉亚进战场时，检视每位对手的牌库顶牌并牌面朝下地放逐这些牌。 {T}，牺牲一个神器：选择一项～ •直到回合结束，你可以使用一张以洛比莉亚放逐的牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。 •每位对手各失去2点生命且你获得2点生命。

trans-unit.source:
Menace
Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, create a Food token.
Whenever you sacrifice a Food, put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.
When CARDNAME leaves the battlefield, target opponent loses life equal to its power.
trans-unit.target: 威慑 每当由你操控的一个或数个生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，派出一个食品衍生物。 每当你牺牲一个食品时，在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。 当CARDNAME离开战场时，目标对手失去等同于其力量的生命。

Draw a card.\n{X}{1}{B}: Put target creature card with mana value X exiled with Shelob onto the battlefield tapped under your control.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由对手操控且非衍生物的生物死去时，将它放逐。 {2}{B}，将一张以CARDNAME放逐的生物牌置入其拥有者的坟墓场：在希洛布上放置两个+1/+1指示物。抓一张牌。 {X}{1}{B}：将目标以希洛布放逐且法术力值为X的生物牌在你操控下横置放进战场。

trans-unit.source: "There are but two courses: to hide the Ring forever; or to unmake it."

You may cast that card without paying its mana cost. Then that player puts the exiled cards that weren't cast this way on the bottom of their library in a random order.

trans-unit.resname: LTC·353 | Shadowspear | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and has trample and lifelink.\n{1}: Permanents your opponents control lose hexproof and indestructible until end of turn.\nEquip {2}

trans-unit.resname: LTC·353 | Shadowspear | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Few now have the skill in healing to match such evil weapons."\n—Strider
trans-unit.target: 「如今已几乎没有高明医者足以抗衡这邪恶武器。」 ～大步佬

trans-unit.resname: LTC·354 | Sword of Hearth and Home | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sword of Hearth and Home
trans-unit.target: 桑梓剑

trans-unit.resname: LTC·354 | Sword of Hearth and Home | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has protection from green and from white.\nWhenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, exile up to one target creature you own, then search your library for a basic land card. Put both cards onto the battlefield under your control, then shuffle.\nEquip {2}

trans-unit.resname: LTC·355 | Sword of the Animist | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sword of the Animist
trans-unit.target: 物灵师之剑

trans-unit.resname: LTC·355 | Sword of the Animist | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Equipped creature gets +1/+1.\nWhenever equipped creature attacks, you may search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.\nEquip {2}

trans-unit.resname: LTC·355 | Sword of the Animist | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "My heart rejoices; for you, Estel, shall be among the great whose valor will destroy the Shadow."\n—Arwen
trans-unit.target: 「而我心却欢欣鼓舞；因为你，埃斯泰尔，定将跻身凭勇气消灭魔影的伟人之列。」 ～阿尔玟

trans-unit.resname: LTC·356 | Thorn of Amethyst | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Thorn of Amethyst
trans-unit.target: 紫水晶刺

trans-unit.resname: LTC·356 | Thorn of Amethyst | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Noncreature spells cost {1} more to cast.
trans-unit.target: 非生物咒语增加{1}来施放。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·356 | Thorn of Amethyst | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Narsil was broken and its light extinguished, and it has not yet been forged again."\n—Elrond
trans-unit.target: 「纳熙尔剑身已断、光芒消逝，至今不曾重铸。」 ～埃尔隆德

trans-unit.resname: LTC·357 | Ancient Tomb | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ancient Tomb
trans-unit.target: 古墓

trans-unit.resname: LTC·357 | Ancient Tomb | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {C}{C}. Balin's Tomb deals 2 damage to you.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{C}{C}。矮人巴林之墓对你造成2点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·357 | Ancient Tomb | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source:
On the slab runes were deeply graven:
BALIN
SON OF FUNDIN
LORD OF MORIA
trans-unit.target: 石板上深深镌刻着这样的如尼文字： 巴林 芬丁之子 墨瑞亚之主

trans-unit.resname: LTC·358 | Bojuka Bog | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Bojuka Bog
trans-unit.target: 泊卒卡腐沼

trans-unit.resname: LTC·358 | Bojuka Bog | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Barrow-Downs enters the battlefield tapped.\nWhen Barrow-Downs enters the battlefield, exile target player's graveyard.\n{T}: Add {B}.
trans-unit.target: 古冢须横置进战场。 当古冢进战场时，放逐目标牌手的坟墓场。 {T}：加{B}。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·358 | Bojuka Bog | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: There loomed against the westward stars a dark black shape: a great barrow stood there.
trans-unit.target: 西方星空下隐约显现出一个深黑形状：一座庞大的古冢。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·359 | Boseiju, Who Shelters All | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Boseiju, Who Shelters All
trans-unit.target: 母圣树

trans-unit.resname: LTC·359 | Boseiju, Who Shelters All | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Isengard, Saruman's Fortress enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}, Pay 2 life: Add {C}. If that mana is spent on an instant or sorcery spell, that spell can't be countered.
trans-unit.target: 萨茹曼要塞艾森加德须横置进战场。 {T}，支付2点生命：加{C}。如果该法术力用以支付瞬间或法术咒语，则该咒语不能被反击。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·359 | Boseiju, Who Shelters All | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Grey ruins falling into darkness, even with sunlight still shining in the sky.
trans-unit.target: 纵使天空中阳光明媚，灰色废墟仍落在黑暗之中。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·360 | Cabal Coffers | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Cabal Coffers
trans-unit.target: 柯帮金库

trans-unit.resname: LTC·360 | Cabal Coffers | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {2}, {T}: Add {B} for each Swamp you control.
trans-unit.target: {2}，{T}：你每操控一个沼泽，便加{B}。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·360 | Cabal Coffers | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Evil things came forth, and they took Minas Ithil and abode in it, and they made it into a place of dread; it is now called Minas Morgul, the Tower of Sorcery."\n—Elrond
trans-unit.target: 邪物出击，夺下米那斯伊希尔作为据点，将之化作恐惧之地；该处如今名唤米那斯魔古尔，意即『妖术之塔』。」 ～埃尔隆德

trans-unit.resname: LTC·361 | Castle Ardenvale | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 雅登瓦堡

trans-unit.resname: LTC·361 | Castle Ardenvale | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Meduseld, Golden Hall of Edoras enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Plains.\n{T}: Add {W}.\n{2}{W}{W}, {T}: Create a 1/1 white Human creature token.
trans-unit.target: 除非你操控平原，否则埃多拉斯金殿美杜塞尔德须横置进战场。 {T}：加{W}。 {2}{W}{W}，{T}：派出一个1/1白色士兵衍生生物。
trans-unit.note: 派出的衍生生物类别应为「人类」。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·361 | Castle Ardenvale | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The hall was long and wide and filled with shadows. Mighty pillars upheld its lofty roof.
trans-unit.target: 殿内狭长宽阔、光影交织。建筑梁柱厚重、屋顶高挑。
trans-unit.note: 派出的衍生生物类别应为「人类」。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·362 | Cavern of Souls | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Cavern of Souls
trans-unit.target: 灵魂洞窟

trans-unit.resname: LTC·362 | Cavern of Souls | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As Paths of the Dead enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.\n{T}: Add {C}.\n{T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast a creature spell of the chosen type, and that spell can't be countered.
trans-unit.target: 于亡者之路进战场时，选择一种生物类别。 {T}：加{C}。 {T}：加一点任意颜色的法术力。此法术力只能用来施放该类别的生物咒语，且该咒语不能被反击。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·363 | Deserted Temple | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Deserted Temple
trans-unit.target: 荒芜寺院

trans-unit.resname: LTC·363 | Deserted Temple | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {C}.\n{1}, {T}: Untap target land.

trans-unit.resname: LTC·363 | Deserted Temple | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Amon Sûl they called it. It was burned and broken, and nothing remains of it now but a tumbled ring, like a rough crown on the old hill's head.
trans-unit.target: 这地方他们称作阿蒙苏尔。原来的瞭望塔已遭烧毁坍塌，如今只一圈残迹，就像一顶戴在这座旧山头上的粗糙王冠。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·364 | Gemstone Caverns | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Gemstone Caverns
trans-unit.target: 宝石洞穴

trans-unit.resname: LTC·364 | Gemstone Caverns | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: If Glittering Caves of Aglarond is in your opening hand and you're not the starting player, you may begin the game with Glittering Caves of Aglarond on the battlefield with a luck counter on it. If you do, exile a card from your hand.\n{T}: Add {C}. If Glittering Caves of Aglarond has a luck counter on it, instead add one mana of any color.
trans-unit.target: 若你起手的手牌包含了阿格拉隆德的晶辉洞，且你不是先手牌手，则你可以让阿格拉隆德的晶辉洞在战场上来开始游戏，且上面有一个运气指示物。如果你如此作，则从你手上放逐一张牌。 {T}：加{C}。如果阿格拉隆德的晶辉洞上有运气指示物，则改为加一点任意颜色的法术力。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·365 | Homeward Path | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Homeward Path
trans-unit.target: 返乡之径

trans-unit.resname: LTC·365 | Homeward Path | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {C}.\n{T}: Each player gains control of all creatures they own.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{C}。 {T}：每位牌手各获得所有由其拥有之生物的操控权。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·365 | Homeward Path | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source:
"Let others a journey new begin,
But I at last with weary feet
Will turn towards the lighted inn,
My evening-rest and sleep to meet."
—Bilbo's song
trans-unit.target: 「任由他人踏新路， 疲惫如我自歇足。 明亮旅店寻道去， 暮休一觉美梦来。」 ～比尔博的歌

trans-unit.resname: LTC·366 | Horizon Canopy | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Horizon Canopy
trans-unit.target: 遍野林冠

trans-unit.resname: LTC·366 | Horizon Canopy | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}, Pay 1 life: Add {G} or {W}.\n{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Bag End: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: {T}，支付1点生命：加{G}或{W}。 {1}，{T}，牺牲袋底洞：抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·366 | Horizon Canopy | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: It was popularly believed, as local legend, that the Hill at Bag End was full of tunnels stuffed with treasure.
trans-unit.target: 当地传言说，袋底洞的小丘底下都是塞满各种财宝的地道，大家也对此深信不疑。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·367 | Karakas | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Karakas
trans-unit.target: 卡拉卡斯

trans-unit.resname: LTC·367 | Karakas | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {W}.\n{T}: Return target legendary creature to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{W}。 {T}：将目标传奇生物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·367 | Karakas | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I stand in the place of the Steward of Gondor, and it is mine to think first of its people. Gondor must be protected."\n—Prince Imrahil
trans-unit.target: 「眼下我暂代刚铎宰相之职，须以百姓为第一要务。必须守好刚铎。」 ～伊姆拉希尔亲王

trans-unit.resname: LTC·368 | Kor Haven | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Kor Haven
trans-unit.target: 寇族庇护地

trans-unit.resname: LTC·368 | Kor Haven | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {C}.\n{1}{W}, {T}: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by target attacking creature this turn.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{C}。 {1}{W}，{T}：于本回合中，防止目标进行攻击的生物将造成的所有战斗伤害。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·368 | Kor Haven | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The chief city of the Kings of Men was Osgiliath, Citadel of the Stars. Now it is deserted, and in its ruins shadows walk.
trans-unit.target: 原本「人中王者」设都于星辰城堡欧斯吉利亚斯。此处如今已遭废弃，空余邪影在残垣徘徊。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·369 | Minamo, School at Water's Edge | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Minamo, School at Water's Edge
trans-unit.target: 水面院

trans-unit.resname: LTC·369 | Minamo, School at Water's Edge | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {U}.\n{U}, {T}: Untap target legendary permanent.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{U}。 {U}，{T}：重置目标传奇永久物。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·369 | Minamo, School at Water's Edge | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Beyond, in the great fief of Belfalas, dwelt Prince Imrahil in his castle of Dol Amroth by the sea.
trans-unit.target: 但是穿过那片地区之后，便是广阔封地贝尔法拉斯。伊姆拉希尔亲王就住在此处的海边城堡多阿姆洛斯里面。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·370 | Mouth of Ronom | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mouth of Ronom
trans-unit.target: 若纳山口

trans-unit.resname: LTC·370 | Mouth of Ronom | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {C}.\n{4}{S}, {T}, Sacrifice Redhorn Pass: It deals 4 damage to target creature.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{C}。 {4}{S}，{T}，牺牲红角口：它对目标生物造成4点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·370 | Mouth of Ronom | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "We shall meet bitter cold, if not worse, before we come down on the other side. It will not help us to keep so secret that we are frozen to death."\n—Boromir
trans-unit.target: 「我们翻山去到另一头之前，就会遇到严寒甚至更糟的情况。如果我们冻死了的话，行动再隐秘都没用。」 ～波洛米尔

trans-unit.resname: LTC·371 | Oboro, Palace in the Clouds | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Oboro, Palace in the Clouds
trans-unit.target: 云殿胧宫

trans-unit.resname: LTC·371 | Oboro, Palace in the Clouds | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {U}.\n{1}: Return Bucklebury Ferry to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{U}。 {1}：将雄鹿镇渡口移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·371 | Oboro, Palace in the Clouds | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The Brandywine flowed slow and broad before them. A large flat ferry-boat was moored beside the landing.
trans-unit.target: 白兰地河横跨他们面前，河道宽广、流水潺潺。码头边就系着一艘平底大渡船。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·372 | Pillar of the Paruns | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Pillar of the Paruns
trans-unit.target: 元祖柱

trans-unit.resname: LTC·372 | Pillar of the Paruns | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast a multicolored spell.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加一点任意颜色的法术力。此法术力只能用来施放多色咒语。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·372 | Pillar of the Paruns | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source:
"The Road goes ever on and on,
Down from the door where it began.
Now far ahead the Road has gone,
And I must follow, if I can."
—Frodo's song
trans-unit.target: 「大路绵延遍天涯， 门外旅途始足下。 哪怕前道跨山水， 加快脚步紧跟随。」 ～弗罗多的歌

trans-unit.resname: LTC·373 | Reflecting Pool | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Reflecting Pool
trans-unit.target: 映景明湖

trans-unit.resname: LTC·373 | Reflecting Pool | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add one mana of any type that a land you control could produce.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加一点法术力，其类别为由你操控的地能产生之任一类别。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·373 | Reflecting Pool | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "This is the Window of the Sunset, fairest of all the falls of Ithilien, land of many fountains."\n—Faramir
trans-unit.target: 「这是『落日之窗』。纵便是在多泉之地伊希利恩内，最美瀑布也非它莫属。」 ～法拉米尔

trans-unit.resname: LTC·374 | Shinka, the Bloodsoaked Keep | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Shinka, the Bloodsoaked Keep
trans-unit.target: 腥血阁真火

trans-unit.resname: LTC·374 | Shinka, the Bloodsoaked Keep | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {R}.\n{R}, {T}: Target legendary creature gains first strike until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{R}。 {R}，{T}：目标传奇生物获得先攻异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·374 | Shinka, the Bloodsoaked Keep | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The keep was called the Hornburg, for a trumpet sounded upon the tower echoed in the Deep behind, as if armies long-forgotten were issuing to war from caves beneath the hills.
trans-unit.target: 此处被称为号角堡，因为只要有人在高塔上吹响号角，后方山谷便会回音震荡，仿佛有久遭遗忘的千军万马从山下洞穴冲出，杀向战场。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·375 | Urborg, Tomb of Yawgmoth | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Urborg, Tomb of Yawgmoth
trans-unit.target: 约格莫夫之墓乌尔博格

trans-unit.resname: LTC·375 | Urborg, Tomb of Yawgmoth | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each land is a Swamp in addition to its other land types.
trans-unit.target: 每个地均额外具有沼泽此地类别。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·375 | Urborg, Tomb of Yawgmoth | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "All dead, all rotten. Elves and Men and Orcs. There was a great battle here long ago, yes."\n—Gollum
trans-unit.target: 「全都死了，全都烂了。精灵、人类还有奥克。这里很久以前有过一场大战，是的。」 ～咕噜

trans-unit.resname: LTC·376 | Wasteland | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Wasteland
trans-unit.target: 荒原

trans-unit.resname: LTC·376 | Wasteland | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {C}.\n{T}, Sacrifice Valley of Gorgoroth: Destroy target nonbasic land.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{C}。 {T}，牺牲戈埚洛斯山谷：消灭目标非基本地。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·376 | Wasteland | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "But I am going to Mordor," said Frodo.\n"I know that well enough," said Sam. "Of course you are. And I'm coming with you."
trans-unit.target: 「可我要去的，是魔多。」弗罗多说。 「这我清楚得很，」山姆说。「你当然是要去魔多。而我要跟你一起去。」

trans-unit.resname: LTC·378 | The Great Henge | Card Name
trans-unit.source: The Great Henge
trans-unit.target: 巨石圆阵

trans-unit.resname: LTC·378 | The Great Henge | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: This spell costs {X} less to cast, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control.\n{T}: Add {G}{G}. You gain 2 life.\nWhenever a nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on it and draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 此咒语减少{X}来施放，X为由你操控的生物中力量最大者的数值。 {T}：加{G}{G}。你获得2点生命。 每当一个非衍生物的生物在你的操控下进战场时，在其上放置一个+1/+1指示物且抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·379 | Cloudstone Curio | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Cloudstone Curio
trans-unit.target: 云石古物

trans-unit.resname: LTC·379 | Cloudstone Curio | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a nonartifact permanent enters the battlefield under your control, you may return another permanent you control that shares a permanent type with it to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个非神器的永久物在你的操控下进战场时，你可以将另一个由你操控且与之具共通永久物类别的永久物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·379 | Cloudstone Curio | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Aragorn took the green stone and held it up, and there came a green fire from his hand.
trans-unit.target: 阿拉贡摘下那块绿宝石高高举起，随即有道绿色火光从他手中迸发而出。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·380 | Ensnaring Bridge | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ensnaring Bridge
trans-unit.target: 陷阱桥

trans-unit.resname: LTC·380 | Ensnaring Bridge | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Creatures with power greater than the number of cards in your hand can't attack.
trans-unit.target: 力量大于你手牌数量的生物不能攻击。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·380 | Ensnaring Bridge | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The way out lay across a slender bridge of stone. It was an ancient defense of the Dwarves that could only be traversed in single file.
trans-unit.target: 前路就只剩一条狭长石拱桥：这是矮人古时候的防御工事，令敌人只能排成一行鱼贯通过。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·381 | The Ozolith | Card Name
trans-unit.source: The Ozolith
trans-unit.target: 欧佐晶岩

trans-unit.resname: LTC·381 | The Ozolith | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature you control leaves the battlefield, if it had counters on it, put those counters on CARDNAME.\nAt the beginning of combat on your turn, if CARDNAME has counters on it, you may move all counters from CARDNAME onto target creature.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控的生物离开战场时，若其上有指示物，则将这些指示物放置在王者双柱阿刚那斯上。 在你回合的战斗开始时，若阿刚那斯上有指示物，则你可以将阿刚那斯上的所有指示物移到目标生物上。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·382 | Rings of Brighthearth | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Rings of Brighthearth
trans-unit.target: 明炉戒

trans-unit.resname: LTC·382 | Rings of Brighthearth | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you activate an ability, if it isn't a mana ability, you may pay {2}. If you do, copy that ability. You may choose new targets for the copy.
trans-unit.target: 每当你起动异能时，若它不是法术力异能，则你可以支付{2}。若你如此作，则复制该异能。你可以为该复制品选择新的目标。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·382 | Rings of Brighthearth | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: All that has been wrought by those who wield the Three will turn to their undoing, and their minds and hearts will become revealed to Sauron, if he regains the One.
trans-unit.target: 倘若索隆得回至尊戒，那么三戒之主所做的努力全将化成泡影，且其心念也将对索隆表露无遗。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·383 | Shadowspear | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Shadowspear
trans-unit.target: 蔽影矛

trans-unit.resname: LTC·383 | Shadowspear | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and has trample and lifelink.\n{1}: Permanents your opponents control lose hexproof and indestructible until end of turn.\nEquip {2}

trans-unit.resname: LTC·383 | Shadowspear | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Few now have the skill in healing to match such evil weapons."\n—Strider
trans-unit.target: 「如今已几乎没有高明医者足以抗衡这邪恶武器。」 ～大步佬

trans-unit.resname: LTC·384 | Sword of Hearth and Home | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sword of Hearth and Home
trans-unit.target: 桑梓剑

trans-unit.resname: LTC·384 | Sword of Hearth and Home | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has protection from green and from white.\nWhenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, exile up to one target creature you own, then search your library for a basic land card. Put both cards onto the battlefield under your control, then shuffle.\nEquip {2}

trans-unit.resname: LTC·385 | Sword of the Animist | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sword of the Animist
trans-unit.target: 物灵师之剑

trans-unit.resname: LTC·385 | Sword of the Animist | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Equipped creature gets +1/+1.\nWhenever equipped creature attacks, you may search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.\nEquip {2}

trans-unit.resname: LTC·385 | Sword of the Animist | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "My heart rejoices; for you, Estel, shall be among the great whose valor will destroy the Shadow."\n—Arwen
trans-unit.target: 「而我心却欢欣鼓舞；因为你，埃斯泰尔，定将跻身凭勇气消灭魔影的伟人之列。」 ～阿尔玟

trans-unit.resname: LTC·386 | Thorn of Amethyst | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Thorn of Amethyst
trans-unit.target: 紫水晶刺

trans-unit.resname: LTC·386 | Thorn of Amethyst | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Noncreature spells cost {1} more to cast.
trans-unit.target: 非生物咒语增加{1}来施放。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·386 | Thorn of Amethyst | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Narsil was broken and its light extinguished, and it has not yet been forged again."\n—Elrond
trans-unit.target: 「纳熙尔剑身已断、光芒消逝，至今不曾重铸。」 ～埃尔隆德

trans-unit.resname: LTC·387 | Ancient Tomb | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ancient Tomb
trans-unit.target: 古墓

trans-unit.resname: LTC·387 | Ancient Tomb | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {C}{C}. CARDNAME deals 2 damage to you.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{C}{C}。矮人巴林之墓对你造成2点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·387 | Ancient Tomb | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source:
On the slab runes were deeply graven:
BALIN
SON OF FUNDIN
LORD OF MORIA
trans-unit.target: 石板上深深镌刻着这样的如尼文字： 巴林 芬丁之子 墨瑞亚之主

trans-unit.resname: LTC·388 | Bojuka Bog | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Bojuka Bog
trans-unit.target: 泊卒卡腐沼

trans-unit.resname: LTC·388 | Bojuka Bog | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, exile target player's graveyard.\n{T}: Add {B}.
trans-unit.target: 古冢须横置进战场。 当古冢进战场时，放逐目标牌手的坟墓场。 {T}：加{B}。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·388 | Bojuka Bog | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: There loomed against the westward stars a dark black shape: a great barrow stood there.
trans-unit.target: 西方星空下隐约显现出一个深黑形状：一座庞大的古冢。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·389 | Boseiju, Who Shelters All | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Boseiju, Who Shelters All
trans-unit.target: 母圣树

trans-unit.resname: LTC·389 | Boseiju, Who Shelters All | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}, Pay 2 life: Add {C}. If that mana is spent on an instant or sorcery spell, that spell can't be countered.
trans-unit.target: 萨茹曼要塞艾森加德须横置进战场。 {T}，支付2点生命：加{C}。如果该法术力用以支付瞬间或法术咒语，则该咒语不能被反击。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·389 | Boseiju, Who Shelters All | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Grey ruins falling into darkness, even with sunlight still shining in the sky
trans-unit.target: 纵使天空中阳光明媚，灰色废墟仍落在黑暗之中。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·390 | Cabal Coffers | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Cabal Coffers
trans-unit.target: 柯帮金库

trans-unit.resname: LTC·390 | Cabal Coffers | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {2}, {T}: Add {B} for each Swamp you control.
trans-unit.target: {2}，{T}：你每操控一个沼泽，便加{B}。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·390 | Cabal Coffers | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Evil things came forth, and they took Minas Ithil and abode in it, and they made it into a place of dread; it is now called Minas Morgul, the Tower of Sorcery."\n—Elrond
trans-unit.target: 邪物出击，夺下米那斯伊希尔作为据点，将之化作恐惧之地；该处如今名唤米那斯魔古尔，意即『妖术之塔』。」 ～埃尔隆德

trans-unit.resname: LTC·391 | Castle Ardenvale | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Castle Ardenvale
trans-unit.target: 雅登瓦堡
trans-unit.note: 派出的衍生生物类别应为「人类」。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·391 | Castle Ardenvale | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Plains.\n{T}: Add {W}.\n{2}{W}{W}, {T}: Create a 1/1 white Human creature token.
trans-unit.target: 除非你操控平原，否则埃多拉斯金殿美杜塞尔德须横置进战场。 {T}：加{W}。 {2}{W}{W}，{T}：派出一个1/1白色士兵衍生生物。
trans-unit.note: 派出的衍生生物类别应为「人类」。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·391 | Castle Ardenvale | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The hall was long and wide and filled with shadows. Mighty pillars upheld its lofty roof.
trans-unit.target: 殿内狭长宽阔、光影交织。建筑梁柱厚重、屋顶高挑。
trans-unit.note: 派出的衍生生物类别应为「人类」。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·392 | Cavern of Souls | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Cavern of Souls
trans-unit.target: 灵魂洞窟

trans-unit.resname: LTC·392 | Cavern of Souls | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As CARDNAME enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.\n{T}: Add {C}.\n{T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast a creature spell of the chosen type, and that spell can't be countered.
trans-unit.target: 于亡者之路进战场时，选择一种生物类别。 {T}：加{C}。 {T}：加一点任意颜色的法术力。此法术力只能用来施放该类别的生物咒语，且该咒语不能被反击。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·393 | Deserted Temple | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Deserted Temple
trans-unit.target: 荒芜寺院

trans-unit.resname: LTC·393 | Deserted Temple | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {C}.\n{1}, {T}: Untap target land.

trans-unit.resname: LTC·393 | Deserted Temple | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Amon Sûl they called it. It was burned and broken, and nothing remains of it now but a tumbled ring, like a rough crown on the old hill's head.
trans-unit.target: 这地方他们称作阿蒙苏尔。原来的瞭望塔已遭烧毁坍塌，如今只一圈残迹，就像一顶戴在这座旧山头上的粗糙王冠。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·394 | Gemstone Caverns | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Gemstone Caverns
trans-unit.target: 宝石洞穴

trans-unit.resname: LTC·394 | Gemstone Caverns | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: If CARDNAME is in your opening hand and you're not the starting player, you may begin the game with CARDNAME on the battlefield with a luck counter on it. If you do, exile a card from your hand.\n{T}: Add {C}. If CARDNAME has a luck counter on it, instead add one mana of any color.
trans-unit.target: 若你起手的手牌包含了阿格拉隆德的晶辉洞，且你不是先手牌手，则你可以让阿格拉隆德的晶辉洞在战场上来开始游戏，且上面有一个运气指示物。如果你如此作，则从你手上放逐一张牌。 {T}：加{C}。如果阿格拉隆德的晶辉洞上有运气指示物，则改为加一点任意颜色的法术力。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·395 | Homeward Path | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Homeward Path
trans-unit.target: 返乡之径

trans-unit.resname: LTC·395 | Homeward Path | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {C}.\n{T}: Each player gains control of all creatures they own.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{C}。 {T}：每位牌手各获得所有由其拥有之生物的操控权。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·395 | Homeward Path | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source:
"Let others a journey new begin,
But I at last with weary feet
Will turn towards the lighted inn,
My evening-rest and sleep to meet."
—Bilbo's song
trans-unit.target: 「任由他人踏新路， 疲惫如我自歇足。 明亮旅店寻道去， 暮休一觉美梦来。」 ～比尔博的歌

trans-unit.resname: LTC·396 | Horizon Canopy | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Horizon Canopy
trans-unit.target: 遍野林冠

trans-unit.resname: LTC·396 | Horizon Canopy | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}, Pay 1 life: Add {G} or {W}.\n{1}, {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: {T}，支付1点生命：加{G}或{W}。 {1}，{T}，牺牲袋底洞：抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·396 | Horizon Canopy | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: It was popularly believed, as local legend, that the Hill at Bag End was full of tunnels stuffed with treasure.
trans-unit.target: 当地传言说，袋底洞的小丘底下都是塞满各种财宝的地道，大家也对此深信不疑。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·397 | Karakas | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Karakas
trans-unit.target: 卡拉卡斯

trans-unit.resname: LTC·397 | Karakas | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {W}.\n{T}: Return target legendary creature to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{W}。 {T}：将目标传奇生物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·397 | Karakas | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I stand in the place of the Steward of Gondor, and it is mine to think first of its people. Gondor must be protected."\n—Prince Imrahil
trans-unit.target: 「眼下我暂代刚铎宰相之职，须以百姓为第一要务。必须守好刚铎。」 ～伊姆拉希尔亲王

trans-unit.resname: LTC·398 | Kor Haven | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Kor Haven
trans-unit.target: 寇族庇护地

trans-unit.resname: LTC·398 | Kor Haven | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {C}.\n{1}{W}, {T}: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by target attacking creature this turn.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{C}。 {1}{W}，{T}：于本回合中，防止目标进行攻击的生物将造成的所有战斗伤害。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·398 | Kor Haven | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The chief city of the Kings of Men was Osgiliath, Citadel of the Stars. Now it is deserted, and in its ruins shadows walk.
trans-unit.target: 原本「人中王者」设都于星辰城堡欧斯吉利亚斯。此处如今已遭废弃，空余邪影在残垣徘徊。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·399 | Minamo, School at Water's Edge | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Minamo, School at Water's Edge
trans-unit.target: 水面院

trans-unit.resname: LTC·399 | Minamo, School at Water's Edge | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {U}.\n{U}, {T}: Untap target legendary permanent.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{U}。 {U}，{T}：重置目标传奇永久物。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·399 | Minamo, School at Water's Edge | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Beyond, in the great fief of Belfalas, dwelt Prince Imrahil in his castle of Dol Amroth by the sea.
trans-unit.target: 但是穿过那片地区之后，便是广阔封地贝尔法拉斯。伊姆拉希尔亲王就住在此处的海边城堡多阿姆洛斯里面。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·400 | Mouth of Ronom | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mouth of Ronom
trans-unit.target: 若纳山口

trans-unit.resname: LTC·400 | Mouth of Ronom | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {C}.\n{4}{S}, {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: It deals 4 damage to target creature. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow source.)
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{C}。 {4}{S}，{T}，牺牲红角口：它对目标生物造成4点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·400 | Mouth of Ronom | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "We shall meet bitter cold, if not worse, before we come down on the other side. It will not help us to keep so secret that we are frozen to death."\n—Boromir
trans-unit.target: 「我们翻山去到另一头之前，就会遇到严寒甚至更糟的情况。如果我们冻死了的话，行动再隐秘都没用。」 ～波洛米尔

trans-unit.resname: LTC·401 | Oboro, Palace in the Clouds | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Oboro, Palace in the Clouds
trans-unit.target: 云殿胧宫

trans-unit.resname: LTC·401 | Oboro, Palace in the Clouds | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {U}.\n{1}: Return CARDNAME to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{U}。 {1}：将雄鹿镇渡口移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·401 | Oboro, Palace in the Clouds | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The Brandywine flowed slow and broad before them. A large flat ferry-boat was moored beside the landing.
trans-unit.target: 白兰地河横跨他们面前，河道宽广、流水潺潺。码头边就系着一艘平底大渡船。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·402 | Pillar of the Paruns | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Pillar of the Paruns
trans-unit.target: 元祖柱

trans-unit.resname: LTC·402 | Pillar of the Paruns | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast a multicolored spell.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加一点任意颜色的法术力。此法术力只能用来施放多色咒语。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·402 | Pillar of the Paruns | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source:
"The Road goes ever on and on,
Down from the door where it began.
Now far ahead the Road has gone,
And I must follow, if I can."
—Frodo's song
trans-unit.target: 「大路绵延遍天涯， 门外旅途始足下。 哪怕前道跨山水， 加快脚步紧跟随。」 ～弗罗多的歌

trans-unit.resname: LTC·403 | Reflecting Pool | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Reflecting Pool
trans-unit.target: 映景明湖

trans-unit.resname: LTC·403 | Reflecting Pool | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add one mana of any type that a land you control could produce.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加一点法术力，其类别为由你操控的地能产生之任一类别。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·403 | Reflecting Pool | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "This is the Window of the Sunset, fairest of all the falls of Ithilien, land of many fountains."\n—Faramir
trans-unit.target: 「这是『落日之窗』。纵便是在多泉之地伊希利恩内，最美瀑布也非它莫属。」 ～法拉米尔

trans-unit.resname: LTC·404 | Shinka, the Bloodsoaked Keep | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Shinka, the Bloodsoaked Keep
trans-unit.target: 腥血阁真火

trans-unit.resname: LTC·404 | Shinka, the Bloodsoaked Keep | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {R}.\n{R}, {T}: Target legendary creature gains first strike until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{R}。 {R}，{T}：目标传奇生物获得先攻异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·404 | Shinka, the Bloodsoaked Keep | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The keep was called the Hornburg, for a trumpet sounded upon the tower echoed in the Deep behind, as if armies long-forgotten were issuing to war from caves beneath the hills.
trans-unit.target: 此处被称为号角堡，因为只要有人在高塔上吹响号角，后方山谷便会回音震荡，仿佛有久遭遗忘的千军万马从山下洞穴冲出，杀向战场。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·405 | Urborg, Tomb of Yawgmoth | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Urborg, Tomb of Yawgmoth
trans-unit.target: 约格莫夫之墓乌尔博格

trans-unit.resname: LTC·405 | Urborg, Tomb of Yawgmoth | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each land is a Swamp in addition to its other land types.
trans-unit.target: 每个地均额外具有沼泽此地类别。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·405 | Urborg, Tomb of Yawgmoth | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "All dead, all rotten. Elves and Men and Orcs. There was a great battle here long ago, yes."\n—Gollum
trans-unit.target: 「全都死了，全都烂了。精灵、人类还有奥克。这里很久以前有过一场大战，是的。」 ～咕噜

trans-unit.resname: LTC·406 | Wasteland | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Wasteland
trans-unit.target: 荒原

trans-unit.resname: LTC·406 | Wasteland | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {C}.\n{T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Destroy target nonbasic land.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{C}。 {T}，牺牲戈埚洛斯山谷：消灭目标非基本地。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·406 | Wasteland | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "But I am going to Mordor," said Frodo.\n"I know that well enough," said Sam. "Of course you are. And I'm coming with you."
trans-unit.target: 「可我要去的，是魔多。」弗罗多说。 「这我清楚得很，」山姆说。「你当然是要去魔多。而我要跟你一起去。」

trans-unit.resname: LTC·407 | Yavimaya, Cradle of Growth | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Yavimaya, Cradle of Growth
trans-unit.target: 育苗摇篮亚维马雅

trans-unit.resname: LTC·407 | Yavimaya, Cradle of Growth | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each land is a Forest in addition to its other land types.
trans-unit.target: 每个地均额外具有树林此地类别。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·407 | Yavimaya, Cradle of Growth | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Pippin thought he saw groves of trees moving. Could it be that the trees of Fangorn were awake, and the forest was rising, marching over the hills to war?
trans-unit.target: 皮平感觉他看到无数树丛在移动。难道说范贡森林的树木全都醒转，整座森林悉数起身，打算翻过山头去参战？

trans-unit.resname: LTR·1 | Banish from Edoras | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Banish from Edoras
trans-unit.target: 逐出埃多拉斯

trans-unit.resname: LTR·1 | Banish from Edoras | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: This spell costs {2} less to cast if it targets a tapped creature.\nExile target creature.
trans-unit.target: 如果此咒语以已横置的生物为目标，则它减少{2}来施放。 放逐目标生物。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·1 | Banish from Edoras | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Wormtongue bared his teeth; and then with a hissing breath he spat before the king's feet.
trans-unit.target: 佞舌龇牙咧嘴，随即嗤的一声往国王跟前吐了口痰。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·2 | The Battle of Bywater | Card Name
trans-unit.source: The Battle of Bywater
trans-unit.target: 傍水镇之战

trans-unit.resname: LTR·2 | The Battle of Bywater | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy all creatures with power 3 or greater. Then create a Food token for each creature you control. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")
trans-unit.target: 消灭所有力量等于或大于3的生物。然后你每操控一个生物，便派出一个食品衍生物。（它是具有「{2}，{T}，牺牲此神器：你获得3点生命」的神器。）

trans-unit.resname: LTR·2 | The Battle of Bywater | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The Tooks marched in with Pippin at their head. Merry now had enough sturdy Hobbitry to deal with the ruffians.
trans-unit.target: 图克家的人全都跟着皮平来到镇上。于是梅里就有了足够的霍比特壮汉来对付恶棍。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·3 | Bill the Pony | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Bill the Pony
trans-unit.target: 小马比尔

trans-unit.resname: LTR·3 | Bill the Pony | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create two Food tokens. (They're artifacts with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")\nSacrifice a Food: Until end of turn, target creature you control assigns combat damage equal to its toughness rather than its power.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，派出两个食品衍生物。（它们是具有「{2}，{T}，牺牲此神器：你获得3点生命」的神器。） 牺牲一个食品：直到回合结束，目标由你操控的生物依照其防御力来分配战斗伤害，而不是依照力量。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·4 | Boromir, Warden of the Tower | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Boromir, Warden of the Tower
trans-unit.target: 白塔守护波洛米尔

trans-unit.resname: LTR·4 | Boromir, Warden of the Tower | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Vigilance\nWhenever an opponent casts a spell, if no mana was spent to cast it, counter that spell.\nSacrifice CARDNAME: Creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn. The Ring tempts you.
trans-unit.target: 警戒 每当任一对手施放咒语，若施放它时未支付过法术力，则反击该咒语。 牺牲CARDNAME：由你操控的生物获得不灭异能直到回合结束。魔戒引诱你。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·4 | Boromir, Warden of the Tower | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Farewell, Aragorn! Go to Minas Tirith and save my people!"
trans-unit.target: 「别了，阿拉贡！去米那斯提力斯，拯救我的人民！」

trans-unit.resname: LTR·5 | Dawn of a New Age | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Dawn of a New Age
trans-unit.target: 新纪元的曙光

trans-unit.resname: LTR·5 | Dawn of a New Age | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield with a hope counter on it for each creature you control.\nAt the beginning of your end step, remove a hope counter from CARDNAME. If you do, draw a card. Then if CARDNAME has no hope counters on it, sacrifice it and you gain 4 life.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME进战场时上面有数个希望指示物，其数量等同于由你操控的生物数量。 在你的结束步骤开始时，从CARDNAME上移去一个希望指示物。若你如此作，则抓一张牌。然后如果CARDNAME上没有希望指示物，则将它牺牲且你获得4点生命。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·6 | Dúnedain Blade | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 杜内丹之刃

trans-unit.resname: LTR·6 | Dúnedain Blade | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The sword glinted in the westering sun.
trans-unit.target: 落日余晖映在宝剑上，照得闪闪发光。

trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME进战场时，直到回合结束，由你操控的生物得+1/+0且获得先攻异能。 循环平原{1}（{1}，弃掉此牌：从你牌库中搜寻一张平原牌，展示该牌，将它置于你手上，然后洗牌。）

trans-unit.resname: LTR·8 | Eastfarthing Farmer | Card Name

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create a Food token. When you do, target creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each Food you control. (A Food token is an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，派出一个食品衍生物。当你如此作时，你每操控一个食品，目标由你操控的生物便得+1/+1直到回合结束。（食品衍生物是具有「{2}，{T}，牺牲此神器：你获得3点生命」的神器。）

trans-unit.target: 警戒 每当CARDNAME对任一鬼怪或半兽人造成伤害时，消灭后者。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·9 | East-Mark Cavalier | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The Rohirrim have long been the friends of the people of Gondor, though they are not akin to them."\n—Aragorn
trans-unit.target: 「洛希尔人长久以来都是刚铎人民的朋友；不过他们之间并非同族。」 ～阿拉贡

trans-unit.resname: LTR·10 | Éowyn, Lady of Rohan | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Éowyn, Lady of Rohan
trans-unit.target: 洛汗公主伊奥温

trans-unit.resname: LTR·10 | Éowyn, Lady of Rohan | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of combat on your turn, target creature gains your choice of first strike or vigilance until end of turn. If that creature is equipped, it gains first strike and vigilance until end of turn instead.\nEquip abilities you activate cost {1} less to activate.
trans-unit.target: 在你回合的战斗开始时，目标生物依你的选择获得先攻异能或警戒异能直到回合结束。若该生物佩带武具，则改为它获得先攻与警戒直到回合结束。 你起动的佩带异能减少{1}来起动。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·11 | Errand-Rider of Gondor | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Errand-Rider of Gondor
trans-unit.target: 刚铎信使

trans-unit.resname: LTR·11 | Errand-Rider of Gondor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, draw a card. Then if you don't control a legendary creature, put a card from your hand on the bottom of your library.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，抓一张牌。然后若你未操控传奇生物，则将一张牌从你手上置于你的牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·11 | Errand-Rider of Gondor | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Gondor is in great need. Lord Denethor asks for all your strength and all your speed, lest Gondor fall at last."
trans-unit.target: 「刚铎如今情势危急。德内梭尔城主请您倾力相助，尽速出兵，否则刚铎必将陷落。」

trans-unit.resname: LTR·12 | Escape from Orthanc | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Escape from Orthanc
trans-unit.target: 逃离欧尔桑克

trans-unit.resname: LTR·12 | Escape from Orthanc | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target creature gets +1/+3 and gains flying until end of turn. Untap it.
trans-unit.target: 直到回合结束，目标生物得+1/+3且获得飞行异能。将它重置。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·12 | Escape from Orthanc | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "How far can you bear me?" asked Gandalf.\n"Many leagues," said Gwaihir, "but not to the ends of the earth. I was sent to bear tidings, not burdens."
trans-unit.target: 「你能载我飞多远？」甘道夫问。 「许多里格，」格怀希尔说，「但不能去到大地的尽头。我是被派来送信的，不是来送人的。」

trans-unit.resname: LTR·13 | Esquire of the King | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source:
"Where now the horse and the rider?
Where is the horn that was blowing?
Where is the helm and the hauberk,
and the bright hair flowing?"
—Lament for the Rohirrim
trans-unit.target: 「骏马骁骑在何方？ 长鸣号角存何方？ 贴身佩甲散沙场， 盔下金发飘何方？」 ～《洛希尔人悼悲曲》

trans-unit.target: 在你的结束步骤开始时，若本回合中有生物在你的操控下死去，则抓一张牌。 每当魔戒引诱你时，若你选择CARDNAME以外的生物作你的持戒人，则派出一个1/1白色人类／士兵衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·15 | Flowering of the White Tree | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Aragorn planted the new tree in the court by the fountain, and swiftly and gladly it began to grow.
trans-unit.target: 阿拉贡将新树种在王庭喷泉边，于是它便欢快地迅速生长。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·16 | Fog on the Barrow-Downs | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source:
"Cold be hand and heart and bone,
and cold be sleep under stone:
never more to wake on stony bed,
never, till the Sun fails and the Moon is dead."
trans-unit.target: 「手骨及心全结晶， 石窟长眠冰霜凌： 墓穴酣睡惊复醒， 直至日月不再明。」

trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，将目标武具牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。 只要是在你的回合中，你便可以于你能够施放瞬间的时机下起动佩带异能。 对你于你的每个回合中首度起动的佩带异能而言，你可以支付{0}，而不支付其佩带费用。

Otherwise, the Ring tempts you."
trans-unit.target: {W/B}{W/B}：如果CARDNAME是市民，则它成为基础力量与防御力为2/3、具系命异能的半身人／斥候。 {B}{B}{B}：如果弗罗多是斥候，则它成为半身人／浪客，且具有「每当此生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，如果本盘游戏中魔戒已引诱你四次或更多，则该牌手输掉这盘游戏。若否，则魔戒引诱你。」

trans-unit.resname: LTR·20 | Hobbit's Sting | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "One for the Shire!" cried Aragorn. "The Hobbit's bite is deep! You have a good blade, Frodo son of Drogo!"

trans-unit.resname: LTR·21 | Landroval, Horizon Witness | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: He passed over Udûn and Gorgoroth and saw all the land in ruin and tumult beneath him, and before him Mount Doom blazing, pouring out its fire.
trans-unit.target: 他飞越乌顿和戈埚洛斯，看见身下大地分崩离析，轰鸣作响，而眼前末日山烈焰翻腾，倾泻热火。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·23 | Nimble Hobbit | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The ruffian knew too little of Hobbits to understand his peril. Foolishly, he decided to fight.
trans-unit.target: 那恶棍领队太不了解这些霍比特人了，完全不知道他要面临怎样的危险。因此他愚蠢地决定跟他们干上一架。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·25 | Protector of Gondor | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Orcs were digging deep trenches in a huge ring, just out of bowshot of the walls, while the Men of Minas Tirith looked on, unable to hinder them.
trans-unit.target: 奥克就在城墙弓箭射程之外挖起深深的巨大环形壕沟，而米那斯提力斯的人类守军只能眼睁睁地看着，却无力阻止。

trans-unit.target: 于法拉米尔和伊奥温静静伫立时，他们双手交叠，彼此紧握，但两人却全然不知。
