trans-unit.target: 夏尔的霍比特人喜欢一天吃六餐～当他们吃得到的时候。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·30 | Shire Shirriff | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Shire Shirriff
trans-unit.target: 夏尔夏警

trans-unit.resname: LTR·30 | Shire Shirriff | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Vigilance\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a token. When you do, exile target creature an opponent controls until CARDNAME leaves the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 警戒 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以牺牲一个衍生物。当你如此作时，放逐目标由对手操控的生物，直到CARDNAME离开战场为止。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·30 | Shire Shirriff | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "You're arrested for Gate-breaking, and Tearing up of Rules, and Trespassing, and Bribing Guards with Food."
trans-unit.target: 「你们因以下罪行被捕：破门而入、撕毁规定、擅闯地界，以及用食物贿赂守卫。」

trans-unit.resname: LTR·31 | Slip On the Ring | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Slip On the Ring
trans-unit.target: 误戴魔戒

trans-unit.resname: LTR·31 | Slip On the Ring | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Exile target creature you own, then return it to the battlefield under your control. The Ring tempts you.
trans-unit.target: 放逐目标由你拥有的生物，然后将它在你的操控下移回战场。魔戒引诱你。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·31 | Slip On the Ring | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: How had it come to be on his finger? He wondered if the Ring itself had not played him a trick.
trans-unit.target: 这是怎么戴到他手指上去的？他在想是不是戒指本身就在作弄他。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·32 | Soldier of the Grey Host | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Soldier of the Grey Host
trans-unit.target: 灰色大军士兵

trans-unit.resname: LTR·32 | Soldier of the Grey Host | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flash\nFlying\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 闪现 飞行 当CARDNAME进战场时，目标生物得+2/+0直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·32 | Soldier of the Grey Host | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The Dead awaken; for the hour is come for the oathbreakers."\n—Malbeth the Seer
trans-unit.target: 「亡者苏醒，毁诺者时辰来临。」 ～先知瑁贝斯

trans-unit.resname: LTR·33 | Stalwarts of Osgiliath | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Stalwarts of Osgiliath
trans-unit.target: 欧斯吉利亚斯坚卫

trans-unit.resname: LTR·33 | Stalwarts of Osgiliath | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, the Ring tempts you.\nWhenever you draw your second card each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，魔戒引诱你。 每当你抓每回合中你的第二张牌时，在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·33 | Stalwarts of Osgiliath | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The Enemy must pay dearly for the crossing of the River."\n—Denethor
trans-unit.target: 「大敌若想渡过大河，也须付出惨痛代价。」 ～德内梭尔

trans-unit.resname: LTR·34 | Tale of Tinúviel | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Tale of Tinúviel
trans-unit.target: 缇努维尔的故事

trans-unit.resname: LTR·34 | Tale of Tinúviel | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)
I — Target creature you control gains indestructible for as long as you control CARDNAME.
II — Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
III — Up to two target creatures you control each gain lifelink until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: （于此传纪进战场时及于你抓牌步骤后，加一个学问指示物。到III后牺牲之。） I — 于你操控CARDNAME之时段内，目标由你操控的生物获得不灭异能。 II — 将目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。 III — 至多两个目标由你操控的生物各获得系命异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·35 | Took Reaper | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Took Reaper
trans-unit.target: 图克家收割人

trans-unit.resname: LTR·35 | Took Reaper | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME dies, the Ring tempts you.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME死去时，魔戒引诱你。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·35 | Took Reaper | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The Tooks came, a hundred strong, from Tuckborough and the Green Hills.
trans-unit.target: 图克家的人来了，足有一百个，都是从塔克领和绿丘陵赶来的。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·36 | War of the Last Alliance | Card Name
trans-unit.source: War of the Last Alliance
trans-unit.target: 最后联盟之战

trans-unit.resname: LTR·36 | War of the Last Alliance | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)\nI, II — Search your library for a legendary creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.\nIII — Creatures you control gain double strike until end of turn. The Ring tempts you.
trans-unit.target: （于此传纪进战场时及于你抓牌步骤后，加一个学问指示物。到III后牺牲之。） I, II — 从你牌库中搜寻一张传奇生物牌，展示该牌，将它置于你手上，然后洗牌。 III — 由你操控的生物获得连击异能直到回合结束。魔戒引诱你。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·37 | Westfold Rider | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Westfold Rider
trans-unit.target: 西伏尔德骑手

trans-unit.resname: LTR·37 | Westfold Rider | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Sacrifice CARDNAME: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Activate only as a sorcery.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲CARDNAME：消灭目标神器或结界。只能于法术时机起动。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·37 | Westfold Rider | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The Orcs were greater in number than we counted on. Great Orcs, who also bore the White Hand of Isengard."\n—Éomer
trans-unit.target: 「奥克数量比我们估算的要多。都是些强大的奥克，身上全有艾森加德白手印。」 ～伊奥梅尔

trans-unit.resname: LTR·38 | You Cannot Pass! | Card Name
trans-unit.source: You Cannot Pass!
trans-unit.target: 你休想过！

trans-unit.resname: LTR·38 | You Cannot Pass! | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy target creature that blocked or was blocked by a legendary creature this turn.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标生物，且须为本回合中曾阻挡传奇生物或被传奇生物阻挡者。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·38 | You Cannot Pass! | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: It raised the whip, and the thongs whined and cracked. Fire came from its nostrils. But Gandalf stood firm.
trans-unit.target: 它扬起鞭子，鞭梢呼啸，噼啪作响；鼻孔还喷着火焰。但甘道夫屹立不摇。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·39 | Arwen's Gift | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Arwen's Gift
trans-unit.target: 阿尔玟的赠礼

trans-unit.resname: LTR·39 | Arwen's Gift | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: This spell costs {1} less to cast if you control two or more legendary creatures.\nScry 2, then draw two cards.
trans-unit.target: 如果你操控两个或更多传奇生物，则此咒语减少{1}来施放。 占卜2，然后抓两张牌。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·39 | Arwen's Gift | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Wear this now in memory of Elfstone and Evenstar with whom your life has been woven!"
trans-unit.target: 「请戴着它，以纪念织就你生命的精灵宝石和暮星！」

trans-unit.resname: LTR·40 | The Bath Song | Card Name
trans-unit.source: The Bath Song
trans-unit.target: 洗澡歌

trans-unit.resname: LTR·40 | The Bath Song | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)\nI, II — Draw two cards, then discard a card.\nIII — Shuffle any number of target cards from your graveyard into your library. Add {U}{U}.
trans-unit.target: （于此传纪进战场时及于你抓牌步骤后，加一个学问指示物。到III后牺牲之。） I, II — 抓两张牌，然后弃一张牌。 III — 将任意数量的目标牌从你的坟墓场洗入你的牌库。加{U}{U}。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·41 | Bewitching Leechcraft | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Bewitching Leechcraft
trans-unit.target: 庸医妖术

trans-unit.resname: LTR·41 | Bewitching Leechcraft | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature.\nEnchanted creature has "If this creature would untap during your untap step, remove a +1/+1 counter from it instead. If you do, untap it." (Otherwise, it doesn't untap.)
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物 当CARDNAME进战场时，横置所结附的生物。 所结附的生物具有「如果此生物将在你的重置步骤中重置，则改为从其上移去一个+1/+1指示物。若你如此作，则将它重置。」（若未如此作，它便不能重置。）

trans-unit.resname: LTR·42 | Bill Ferny, Bree Swindler | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Bill Ferny, Bree Swindler
trans-unit.target: 布理骗子比尔·蕨尼

trans-unit.resname: LTR·42 | Bill Ferny, Bree Swindler | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME becomes blocked, choose one —\n• Create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")\n• Target opponent gains control of target Horse you control. If they do, remove Bill Ferny from combat and create three Treasure tokens.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME被阻挡时，选择一项～ •派出一个珍宝衍生物。（它是具有「{T}，牺牲此神器：加一点任意颜色的法术力」的神器。） •目标对手获得目标由你操控的马之操控权。若其如此作，则将比尔·蕨尼移出战斗且你派出三个珍宝衍生物。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·43 | Birthday Escape | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Birthday Escape
trans-unit.target: 抽身寿诞

trans-unit.resname: LTR·43 | Birthday Escape | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Draw a card. The Ring tempts you.
trans-unit.target: 抓一张牌。魔戒引诱你。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·43 | Birthday Escape | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: As Bilbo finished his speech, he slipped the ring on his finger, and he was never seen by any Hobbit in Hobbiton again.
trans-unit.target: 比尔博甫一讲完话，就把手指套进戒指里，从此再也没有哪个霍比特人在霍比屯内见过他。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·44 | Borne Upon a Wind | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Borne Upon a Wind
trans-unit.target: 乘风而行

trans-unit.resname: LTR·44 | Borne Upon a Wind | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: You may cast spells this turn as though they had flash.\nDraw a card.
trans-unit.target: 本回合中，你可以将咒语视同具有闪现异能地来施放。 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·44 | Borne Upon a Wind | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I looked on Aragorn and thought how great and terrible a Lord he might have become, had he taken the Ring for himself. Not for naught does Mordor fear him."\n—Legolas
trans-unit.target: 「我看着阿拉贡，心想如果当初他把魔戒占为己有，会变成怎样一位强大又可怕的君王。魔多怕他不是没理由的。」 ～莱戈拉斯

trans-unit.resname: LTR·45 | Captain of Umbar | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Captain of Umbar
trans-unit.target: 乌姆巴尔船长

trans-unit.resname: LTR·45 | Captain of Umbar | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {1}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
trans-unit.target: {1}，{T}：抓一张牌，然后弃一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·45 | Captain of Umbar | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "There is a great fleet drawing near to the mouths of Anduin, manned by the Corsairs of Umbar in the South. They have long ceased to fear the might of Gondor."\n—Beregond
trans-unit.target: 「有支南方乌姆巴尔海盗麾下的强大舰队正在逼近安都因河口。他们早已不再惧怕刚铎声威。」 ～贝瑞刚德

trans-unit.resname: LTR·46 | Council's Deliberation | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Council's Deliberation
trans-unit.target: 议会千虑

trans-unit.resname: LTR·46 | Council's Deliberation | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Draw a card.\nWhenever you scry, if you control an Island, you may exile CARDNAME from your graveyard. If you do, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 抓一张牌。 每当你占卜时，若你操控海岛，则你可以从你的坟墓场放逐CARDNAME。若你如此作，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·46 | Council's Deliberation | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I will take the Ring to Mordor, though I do not know the way."\n—Frodo
trans-unit.target: 「虽然我不识前路，但愿将魔戒带到魔多。」 ～弗罗多

trans-unit.resname: LTR·47 | Deceive the Messenger | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Deceive the Messenger
trans-unit.target: 欺骗信使

trans-unit.resname: LTR·47 | Deceive the Messenger | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Target creature gets -3/-0 until end of turn.\nAmass Orcs 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. It's also an Orc. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Orc Army creature token first.)
trans-unit.target: 目标生物得-3/-0直到回合结束。 囤兵半兽人1。（在一个由你操控的军队上放置一个+1/+1指示物。它也是半兽人。如果你未操控军队，则先派出一个0/0黑色半兽人／军队衍生生物。）

trans-unit.resname: LTR·47 | Deceive the Messenger | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Tell Gandalf that he must seek my aid at once."\n—Saruman
trans-unit.target: 「告诉甘道夫：他必须马上寻求我的援助。」 ～萨茹曼

trans-unit.resname: LTR·48 | Dreadful as the Storm | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Dreadful as the Storm
trans-unit.target: 恐怖如风暴

trans-unit.resname: LTR·48 | Dreadful as the Storm | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target creature has base power and toughness 5/5 until end of turn. The Ring tempts you.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物的基础力量与防御力为5/5直到回合结束。魔戒引诱你。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·48 | Dreadful as the Storm | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I shall not be dark, but beautiful and terrible as the Morning and the Night! All shall love me and despair!"
trans-unit.target: 「我不会是黑暗的，而会既美丽又恐怖，正如清晨与黑夜！众生万物都将爱我，都将绝望！」

trans-unit.resname: LTR·49 | Elrond, Lord of Rivendell | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Elrond, Lord of Rivendell
trans-unit.target: 幽谷领主埃尔隆德

trans-unit.resname: LTR·49 | Elrond, Lord of Rivendell | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME or another creature enters the battlefield under your control, scry 1. If this is the second time this ability has resolved this turn, the Ring tempts you.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME或另一个生物在你的操控下进战场时，占卜1。若这是此异能在本回合第二次的结算，则魔戒引诱你。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·49 | Elrond, Lord of Rivendell | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "This is the hour of the Shire-folk, when they arise from their quiet fields to shake the towers and counsels of the Great. Who of all the Wise could have foreseen it?"
trans-unit.target: 「这一时刻属于夏尔的子民，他们从宁静田野中挺身而出，撼动伟人的高塔与议会。又有哪位智者曾预见到这一刻？」

trans-unit.resname: LTR·50 | Gandalf, Friend of the Shire | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Gandalf, Friend of the Shire
trans-unit.target: 夏尔之友甘道夫

trans-unit.resname: LTR·50 | Gandalf, Friend of the Shire | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flash\nYou may cast sorcery spells as though they had flash.\nWhenever the Ring tempts you, if you chose a creature other than CARDNAME as your Ring-bearer, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 闪现 你可以将法术咒语视同具有闪现异能地来施放。 每当魔戒引诱你时，若你选择CARDNAME以外的生物作你的持戒人，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·50 | Gandalf, Friend of the Shire | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "After a hundred years, Hobbits can still surprise you at a pinch."
trans-unit.target: 「过了一百年，必要时霍比特人仍能给出惊喜。」

trans-unit.resname: LTR·51 | Glorious Gale | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Glorious Gale
trans-unit.target: 辉煌狂风

trans-unit.resname: LTR·51 | Glorious Gale | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Counter target creature spell. If it was a legendary spell, the Ring tempts you.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标生物咒语。如果它是传奇咒语，则魔戒引诱你。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·51 | Glorious Gale | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The Elves of Lórien took Dol Guldur. Galadriel threw down its walls and laid bare its pits, and the forest was cleansed.
trans-unit.target: 罗瑞恩的精灵攻下了多古尔都。加拉德瑞尔推倒城墙，揭开地洞，净化森林。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·52 | Goldberry, River-Daughter | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Goldberry, River-Daughter
trans-unit.target: 河之女金莓

trans-unit.resname: LTR·52 | Goldberry, River-Daughter | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Move a counter of each kind not on CARDNAME from another target permanent you control onto Goldberry.\n{U}, {T}: Move one or more counters from Goldberry onto another target permanent you control. If you do, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: {T}：选择另一个目标由你操控的永久物。将该永久物上CARDNAME没有的指示物每种各从该处移一个到金莓上。 {U}，{T}：将一个或数个指示物从金莓移到另一个目标由你操控的永久物上。若你如此作，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·52 | Goldberry, River-Daughter | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Fear nothing! For tonight you are under the roof of Tom Bombadil."
trans-unit.target: 「什么都不用怕！因为今晚你们来到了汤姆·邦巴迪尔的家。」

trans-unit.resname: LTR·53 | Grey Havens Navigator | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Grey Havens Navigator
trans-unit.target: 灰港导航员

trans-unit.resname: LTR·53 | Grey Havens Navigator | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flash\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, scry 1.
trans-unit.target: 闪现 当CARDNAME进战场时，占卜1。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·53 | Grey Havens Navigator | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: It was an old tradition that beyond the Shire stood the Grey Havens, from which at times elven-ships set sail, never to return.
trans-unit.target: 这是长久以来的传统：夏尔之外有处灰港，不时会有精灵船只从该处启航，永不归返。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·54 | Hithlain Knots | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Hithlain Knots
trans-unit.target: 希斯莱恩绳结

trans-unit.resname: LTR·54 | Hithlain Knots | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Tap target creature. Scry 1.\nDraw a card.
trans-unit.target: 横置目标生物。占卜1。 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·54 | Hithlain Knots | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "If you will try to run away you must be tied; but we don't wish to hurt you."\n—Sam
trans-unit.target: 「如果你想要逃跑，我们就要把你绑起来；但我们不想伤害你。」 ～山姆

trans-unit.resname: LTR·55 | Horses of the Bruinen | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Horses of the Bruinen
trans-unit.target: 布茹依能骏马

trans-unit.resname: LTR·55 | Horses of the Bruinen | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Return up to two target creatures to their owners' hands. Scry 1. The Ring tempts you.
trans-unit.target: 将至多两个目标生物移回其拥有者手上。占卜1。魔戒引诱你。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·55 | Horses of the Bruinen | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The black horses were filled with madness, and leaping forward in terror they bore their riders into the rushing flood.
trans-unit.target: 那些黑马全都发狂起来，惊恐地大步前冲，纷纷载着骑手一头扎进滚滚洪流当中。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·56 | Ioreth of the Healing House | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ioreth of the Healing House
trans-unit.target: 诊疗院的伊奥瑞丝

trans-unit.resname: LTR·56 | Ioreth of the Healing House | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Untap another target permanent.\n{T}: Untap two other target legendary creatures.
trans-unit.target: {T}：重置另一个目标永久物。 {T}：重置两个其他目标传奇生物。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·56 | Ioreth of the Healing House | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I have been too busy with this and that to heed all the crying and shouting. All I hope is that those murdering devils do not come to this House and trouble the sick."
trans-unit.target: 「我都已经忙得不可开交了，根本没空理会且你大呼小叫。我只希望那些杀人魔鬼别到这院里来找伤者麻烦。」

trans-unit.resname: LTR·57 | Isolation at Orthanc | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Isolation at Orthanc
trans-unit.target: 独囚欧尔桑克

trans-unit.resname: LTR·57 | Isolation at Orthanc | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Put target creature into its owner's library second from the top.
trans-unit.target: 将目标生物置于其拥有者的牌库顶数来第二张的位置。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·57 | Isolation at Orthanc | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "They took me and set me on the pinnacle of Orthanc. I stood alone on an island in the clouds; I had no chance of escape, and my days were bitter and cold."\n—Gandalf
trans-unit.target: 「他们把我抓起来，关在欧尔桑克尖顶上。我就独身一人站在云间孤岛上；根本没有机会逃跑，日子过得又苦又冷。」 ～甘道夫

trans-unit.resname: LTR·58 | Ithilien Kingfisher | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ithilien Kingfisher
trans-unit.target: 伊希利恩翠鸟

trans-unit.resname: LTR·58 | Ithilien Kingfisher | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhen CARDNAME dies, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME死去时，抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·58 | Ithilien Kingfisher | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: After their reunion, the Hobbits spent many days in Ithilien. The stream that flowed from the falls of Henneth Annûn could be heard in the night as it rushed down through its rocky gate.
trans-unit.target: 众人重聚过后，霍比特人仍在伊希利恩住上了许多日子。汉奈斯安努恩瀑布奔腾而下形成溪流，河水冲击该处岩石水口会发出激荡声响，在夜间时分就变得清晰可闻。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·59 | Knights of Dol Amroth | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Knights of Dol Amroth
trans-unit.target: 多阿姆洛斯骑士

trans-unit.resname: LTR·59 | Knights of Dol Amroth | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you draw your second card each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 每当你抓每回合中你的第二张牌时，在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·59 | Knights of Dol Amroth | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: And so the companies came and were hailed and cheered and passed through the Gate.
trans-unit.target: 就这样一支支队伍通过，迎着称赞与欢呼声穿过了城门。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·60 | Lórien Revealed | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Lórien Revealed
trans-unit.target: 揭现罗瑞恩

trans-unit.resname: LTR·60 | Lórien Revealed | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Draw three cards.\nIslandcycling {1} ({1}, Discard this card: Search your library for an Island card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)
trans-unit.target: 抓三张牌。 循环海岛{1}（{1}，弃掉此牌：从你的牌库中搜寻一张海岛牌，展示该牌，将它置于你手上，然后洗牌。）

trans-unit.resname: LTR·60 | Lórien Revealed | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Look on us now with friendly eyes! Behold the trees of the Naith of Lórien and be glad!"\n—Haldir
trans-unit.target: 「现在请用友善的眼光来看待我们！敬请见证罗瑞恩耐斯森林，开心感受吧！」 ～哈尔迪尔

trans-unit.resname: LTR·61 | Lost Isle Calling | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Lost Isle Calling
trans-unit.target: 失落之岛的呼唤

trans-unit.resname: LTR·61 | Lost Isle Calling | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever you scry, put a verse counter on CARDNAME.\n{4}{U}{U}, Exile CARDNAME: Draw a card for each verse counter on CARDNAME. If it had seven or more verse counters on it, take an extra turn after this one. Activate only as a sorcery.
trans-unit.target: 每当你占卜时，在CARDNAME上放置一个词句指示物。 {4}{U}{U}，放逐CARDNAME：CARDNAME上每有一个词句指示物，便抓一张牌。如果其上有七个或更多词句指示物，则于本回合后进行额外的一个回合。只能于法术时机起动。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·61 | Lost Isle Calling | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "To the Sea, to the Sea!"
trans-unit.target: 「向海！向海！」

trans-unit.resname: LTR·62 | Meneldor, Swift Savior | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Meneldor, Swift Savior
trans-unit.target: 迅捷救星美尼尔多

trans-unit.resname: LTR·62 | Meneldor, Swift Savior | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, exile up to one target creature you own, then return it to the battlefield under your control.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当CARDNAME对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，放逐至多一个目标由你拥有的生物，然后将它在你的操控下移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·62 | Meneldor, Swift Savior | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Then come! We have need of speed greater than any wind, outmatching the wings of the Nazgûl."\n—Gandalf
trans-unit.target: 「那就来吧！我们需要的速度得快过疾风，能超过那兹古尔的双翼。」 ～甘道夫

trans-unit.resname: LTR·63 | Nimrodel Watcher | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Nimrodel Watcher
trans-unit.target: 宁洛德尔看守

trans-unit.resname: LTR·63 | Nimrodel Watcher | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you scry, CARDNAME gets +1/+0 until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn. This ability triggers only once each turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当你占卜时，CARDNAME得+1/+0直到回合结束，且本回合不能被阻挡。此异能每回合只会触发一次。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·63 | Nimrodel Watcher | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "But there are some of us still who go abroad for the gathering of news and the watching of our enemies."\n—Haldir
trans-unit.target: 「不过我们有些人还是会出到外面收集消息，监视敌人。」 ～哈尔迪尔

trans-unit.resname: LTR·64 | Pelargir Survivor | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Pelargir Survivor
trans-unit.target: 佩拉基尔幸存者

trans-unit.resname: LTR·64 | Pelargir Survivor | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast an instant or sorcery spell.\n{5}{U}, {T}: Target player mills three cards. (They put the top three cards of their library into their graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: {T}：加一点任意颜色的法术力。此法术力只能用来施放瞬间或法术咒语。 {5}{U}，{T}：目标牌手磨三张牌。（他将其牌库顶的三张牌置入其坟墓场。）

trans-unit.resname: LTR·64 | Pelargir Survivor | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The Corsairs are upon us! Back to the walls! Back to the City before all are overwhelmed!"
trans-unit.target: 「海盗来了！回到墙里来！在全军覆灭前回到石城里来！」

trans-unit.resname: LTR·65 | Press the Enemy | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Press the Enemy
trans-unit.target: 压制敌军

trans-unit.resname: LTR·65 | Press the Enemy | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Return target spell or nonland permanent an opponent controls to its owner's hand. You may cast an instant or sorcery spell with equal or lesser mana value from your hand without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 将目标由对手操控的咒语或非地永久物移回其拥有者手上。你可以从你手上施放一个法术力值相等或较小的瞬间或法术咒语，且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·65 | Press the Enemy | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I showed the blade reforged to him. He is not so mighty yet that he is above fear."
trans-unit.target: 「我向他展示了重铸的剑。他还没有强大到无所畏惧。」

trans-unit.resname: LTR·66 | Rangers of Ithilien | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Rangers of Ithilien
trans-unit.target: 伊希利恩突击队

trans-unit.resname: LTR·66 | Rangers of Ithilien | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Vigilance\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, gain control of up to one target creature with lesser power for as long as you control CARDNAME. Then the Ring tempts you.
trans-unit.target: 警戒 当CARDNAME进战场时，于你操控CARDNAME的时段内，获得至多一个目标力量比它小的生物之操控权。然后魔戒引诱你。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·66 | Rangers of Ithilien | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "We have a new errand on this journey: to ambush the Men of Harad."
trans-unit.target: 「我们此行有新使命：伏击哈拉德的人类。」

trans-unit.resname: LTR·67 | Saruman the White | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Saruman the White
trans-unit.target: 白袍萨茹曼

trans-unit.resname: LTR·67 | Saruman the White | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Ward {2}\nWhenever you cast your second spell each turn, amass Orcs 2. (Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. It's also an Orc. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Orc Army creature token first.)
trans-unit.target: 守护{2} 每当你施放每回合中你的第二个咒语时，囤兵半兽人2。（在一个由你操控的军队上放置两个+1/+1指示物。它也是半兽人。如果你未操控军队，则先派出一个0/0黑色半兽人／军队衍生生物。）

trans-unit.resname: LTR·67 | Saruman the White | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Sauron's victory is at hand; and there will be rich reward for those who aided it."
trans-unit.target: 「索隆胜利唾手可得，出力相助者必得丰厚回报。」

trans-unit.resname: LTR·68 | Saruman's Trickery | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Saruman's Trickery
trans-unit.target: 萨茹曼的诈术

trans-unit.resname: LTR·68 | Saruman's Trickery | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Counter target spell.\nAmass Orcs 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. It's also an Orc. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Orc Army creature token first.)
trans-unit.target: 反击目标咒语。 囤兵半兽人1。（在一个由你操控的军队上放置一个+1/+1指示物。它也是半兽人。如果你未操控军队，则先派出一个0/0黑色半兽人／军队衍生生物。）

trans-unit.resname: LTR·68 | Saruman's Trickery | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I gave you the chance of aiding me willingly."\n—Saruman
trans-unit.target: 「我已给你心甘情愿协助我的机会。」 ～萨茹曼

trans-unit.resname: LTR·69 | Scroll of Isildur | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Scroll of Isildur
trans-unit.target: 伊熙杜尔的书卷

trans-unit.resname: LTR·69 | Scroll of Isildur | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)
I — Gain control of up to one target artifact for as long as you control CARDNAME. The Ring tempts you.
II — Tap up to two target creatures. Put a stun counter on each of them.
III — Draw a card for each tapped creature target opponent controls.
trans-unit.target: （于此传纪进战场时及于你抓牌步骤后，加一个学问指示物。到III后牺牲之。） I — 于你操控CARDNAME之时段内，获得至多一个目标神器的操控权。魔戒引诱你。 II — 横置至多两个目标生物。在这些生物上各放置一个晕眩指示物。 III — 目标对手每操控一个已横置的生物，你便抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·70 | Soothing of Sméagol | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Soothing of Sméagol
trans-unit.target: 宽慰斯密戈

trans-unit.resname: LTR·70 | Soothing of Sméagol | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Return target nontoken creature to its owner's hand. The Ring tempts you.
trans-unit.target: 将目标非衍生物的生物移回其拥有者手上。魔戒引诱你。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·70 | Soothing of Sméagol | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Frodo's heart sank. This was too much like trickery, and certainly what he did would seem a treachery to the poor treacherous creature.
trans-unit.target: 弗罗多的心顿时沉重起来。这实在太像骗局了，而且在这可怜的奸诈生物看来，他的作为肯定就是背叛。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·71 | Stern Scolding | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Stern Scolding
trans-unit.target: 严肃斥责

trans-unit.resname: LTR·71 | Stern Scolding | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Counter target creature spell with power or toughness 2 or less.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标力量或防御力等于或小于2的生物咒语。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·71 | Stern Scolding | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Fool of a Took! This is a serious journey, not a Hobbit walking-party. Throw yourself in next time, and then you will be no further nuisance. Now be quiet!"
trans-unit.target: 「你这蠢图克！这是趟严肃旅程，不是霍比特人的远足聚会。下次你该把你自己丢下去，然后就不会再惹麻烦了。现在给我安静点！」

trans-unit.resname: LTR·72 | Storm of Saruman | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Storm of Saruman
trans-unit.target: 萨茹曼的风暴

trans-unit.resname: LTR·72 | Storm of Saruman | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Ward {3}\nWhenever you cast your second spell each turn, copy it, except the copy isn't legendary. You may choose new targets for the copy. (A copy of a permanent spell becomes a token.)
trans-unit.target: 守护{3} 每当你施放每回合你的第二个咒语时，将它复制，但该复制品不是传奇。你可以为该复制品选择新的目标。（永久物咒语的复制品会成为衍生物。）

trans-unit.resname: LTR·72 | Storm of Saruman | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Isengard had once been filled with fruitful trees, but no green thing grew there in the latter days of Saruman.
trans-unit.target: 艾森加德曾经果树成林，但在萨茹曼统治后期，已然不见半点青翠踪迹。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·73 | Surrounded by Orcs | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Surrounded by Orcs
trans-unit.target: 奥克包围

trans-unit.resname: LTR·73 | Surrounded by Orcs | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Amass Orcs 3, then target player mills X cards, where X is the amassed Army's power. (To amass Orcs 3, put three +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. It's also an Orc. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Orc Army creature token first.)
trans-unit.target: 囤兵半兽人3，然后目标牌手磨X张牌，X为该受囤兵的军队之力量。（囤兵半兽人3的流程是，在一个由你操控的军队上放置三个+1/+1指示物。它也是半兽人。如果你未操控军队，则先派出一个0/0黑色半兽人／军队衍生生物。）

trans-unit.resname: LTR·74 | Treason of Isengard | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Treason of Isengard
trans-unit.target: 艾森加德的背叛

trans-unit.resname: LTR·74 | Treason of Isengard | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Put up to one target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard on top of your library.\nAmass Orcs 2. (To amass Orcs 2, put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. It's also an Orc. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Orc Army creature token first.)
trans-unit.target: 将至多一张目标瞬间或法术牌从你的坟墓场置于你牌库顶。 囤兵半兽人2。（囤兵半兽人2的流程是，在一个由你操控的军队上放置两个+1/+1指示物。它也是半兽人。如果你未操控军队，则先派出一个0/0黑色半兽人／军队衍生生物。）

trans-unit.resname: LTR·75 | The Watcher in the Water | Card Name
trans-unit.source: The Watcher in the Water
trans-unit.target: 水中的监视者

trans-unit.resname: LTR·75 | The Watcher in the Water | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped with nine stun counters on it. (If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.)\nWhenever you draw a card during an opponent's turn, create a 1/1 blue Tentacle creature token.\nWhenever a Tentacle you control dies, untap up to one target Kraken and put a stun counter on up to one target nonland permanent.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场，且上面有九个晕眩指示物。（如果某个其上有晕眩指示物的永久物将成为未横置，则改为从其上移去一个晕眩指示物。） 每当你在对手的回合中抓一张牌时，派出一个1/1蓝色触手衍生生物。 每当一个由你操控的触手死去时，重置至多一个目标巨海兽，并在至多一个目标非地永久物上放置一个晕眩指示物。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·76 | Willow-Wind | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Willow-Wind
trans-unit.target: 清柳风

trans-unit.resname: LTR·76 | Willow-Wind | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, scry 2.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME进战场时，占卜2。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·76 | Willow-Wind | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The branches of the willow began to sway violently. Frodo called for help, but he could hardly hear his own voice: it was blown away from him by the willow-wind and drowned in a clamor of leaves.
trans-unit.target: 柳树的枝叶开始剧烈摆动。弗罗多虽然高声呼救，但他甚至都听不到自己的声音：话语甫一出口，就被柳树的风吹走，淹没在树叶的喧嚣中。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·77 | Bitter Downfall | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Bitter Downfall
trans-unit.target: 苦涩败亡

trans-unit.resname: LTR·77 | Bitter Downfall | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: This spell costs {3} less to cast if it targets a creature that was dealt damage this turn.\nDestroy target creature. Its controller loses 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 如果此咒语以本回合中受过伤害的生物为目标，则它减少{3}来施放。 消灭目标生物。其操控者失去2点生命。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·77 | Bitter Downfall | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I tried to take the Ring from Frodo. I am sorry. I have paid."\n—Boromir
trans-unit.target: 「我刚才试图从弗罗多手里抢过魔戒。非常抱歉。我已经付出了代价。」 ～波洛米尔

trans-unit.resname: LTR·78 | The Black Breath | Card Name
trans-unit.source: The Black Breath
trans-unit.target: 黑息

trans-unit.resname: LTR·78 | The Black Breath | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Creatures your opponents control get -1/-1 until end of turn. The Ring tempts you.
trans-unit.target: 由对手操控的生物得-1/-1直到回合结束。魔戒引诱你。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·78 | The Black Breath | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "When the black breath blows, death's shadow grows."\n—A rhyme of old days
trans-unit.target: 「时值黑息鼓动，死亡阴影渐浓。」 ～古代的歌谣

trans-unit.resname: LTR·79 | Call of the Ring | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Call of the Ring
trans-unit.target: 魔戒呼唤

trans-unit.resname: LTR·79 | Call of the Ring | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, the Ring tempts you.\nWhenever you choose a creature as your Ring-bearer, you may pay 2 life. If you do, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，魔戒引诱你。 每当你选择一个生物作你的持戒人时，你可以支付2点生命。若你如此作，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·79 | Call of the Ring | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The Ring is mine!"
trans-unit.target: 「魔戒是我的！」

trans-unit.resname: LTR·80 | Cirith Ungol Patrol | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Cirith Ungol Patrol
trans-unit.target: 奇立斯乌苟巡卫

trans-unit.resname: LTR·80 | Cirith Ungol Patrol | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice another creature: Draw a card, then create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")
trans-unit.target: {1}，{T}，牺牲另一个生物：抓一张牌，然后派出一个食品衍生物。（它是具有「{2}，{T}，牺牲此神器：你获得3点生命」的神器。）

trans-unit.resname: LTR·80 | Cirith Ungol Patrol | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Spies feared on Stairs. Double vigilance. Patrol to head of Stairs."\n—Shagrat's orders
trans-unit.target: 「阶梯内恐有奸细。加倍警戒。巡逻到顶。」 ～沙格拉特的命令

trans-unit.resname: LTR·81 | Claim the Precious | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Claim the Precious
trans-unit.target: 收获宝贝

trans-unit.resname: LTR·81 | Claim the Precious | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy target creature. The Ring tempts you.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标生物。魔戒引诱你。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·81 | Claim the Precious | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I think it is a sad story, and it might have happened to others, even to some Hobbits that I have known."\n—Gandalf
trans-unit.target: 「我认为这是个悲伤的故事。它可能发生在其他人身上，甚至在某些我认识的霍比特人身上。」 ～甘道夫

trans-unit.resname: LTR·82 | Dunland Crebain | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Dunland Crebain
trans-unit.target: 黑蛮地克拉班

trans-unit.resname: LTR·82 | Dunland Crebain | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, amass Orcs 2. (Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. It's also an Orc. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Orc Army creature token first.)
trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME进战场时，囤兵半兽人2。（在一个由你操控的军队上放置两个+1/+1指示物。它也是半兽人。如果你未操控军队，则先派出一个0/0黑色半兽人／军队衍生生物。）

trans-unit.resname: LTR·82 | Dunland Crebain | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "What's that, Strider? It don't look like a cloud."\n—Sam
trans-unit.target: 「大步佬，那是什么？看起来不像是云。」 ～山姆

trans-unit.resname: LTR·83 | Easterling Vanguard | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Easterling Vanguard

trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME死去时，囤兵半兽人1。（在一个由你操控的军队上放置一个+1/+1指示物。它也是半兽人。如果你未操控军队，则先派出一个0/0黑色半兽人／军队衍生生物。）

trans-unit.resname: LTR·83 | Easterling Vanguard | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: An army of Easterlings charged forth, while from the hills poured Orcs innumerable.
trans-unit.target: 一支东夷军队冲锋向前，山坡上顿时有无数的奥克倾泻而出。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·84 | Gollum, Patient Plotter | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Gollum, Patient Plotter
trans-unit.target: 耐心谋策鬼咕噜

trans-unit.resname: LTR·84 | Gollum, Patient Plotter | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME leaves the battlefield, the Ring tempts you.\n{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Return Gollum from your graveyard to your hand. Activate only as a sorcery.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME离开战场时，魔戒引诱你。 {B}，牺牲一个生物：将咕噜从你的坟墓场移回你手上。只能于法术时机起动。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·84 | Gollum, Patient Plotter | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "They'll take it, steal my Precious. Thieves. We hates them."
trans-unit.target: 「他们会拿走它，偷走我的宝贝。小偷。我们恨他们。」

trans-unit.resname: LTR·85 | Gollum's Bite | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 咕噜啮咬

trans-unit.resname: LTR·85 | Gollum's Bite | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.\n{3}{B}, Exile CARDNAME from your graveyard: The Ring tempts you. Activate only as a sorcery.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物得-2/-2直到回合结束。 {3}{B}，从你的坟墓场中放逐CARDNAME：魔戒引诱你。只能于法术时机起动。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·85 | Gollum's Bite | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "It was Pity that stayed Bilbo's hand. Do not be too eager to deal out death in judgment; Gollum has some part to play yet, before the end."\n—Gandalf, to Frodo
trans-unit.target: 「正是由于心生怜悯，比尔博才没下手。别急着为他人定生死；到最后之前，咕噜还有他的作用。」 ～甘道夫告诫弗罗多

trans-unit.resname: LTR·86 | Gorbag of Minas Morgul | Card Name

trans-unit.resname: LTR·86 | Gorbag of Minas Morgul | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever a Goblin or Orc you control deals combat damage to a player, you may sacrifice it. When you do, choose one —\n• Draw a card.\n• Create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控的鬼怪或半兽人对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，你可以将它牺牲。当你如此作时，选择一项～ •抓一张牌。 •派出一个珍宝衍生物。（它是具有「{T}，牺牲此神器：加一点任意颜色的法术力」的神器。）

trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，囤兵半兽人1。（在一个由你操控的军队上放置一个+1/+1指示物。它也是半兽人。如果你未操控军队，则先派出一个0/0黑色半兽人／军队衍生生物。） 由你操控的衍生生物具有死触异能。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·88 | Gríma Wormtongue | Card Text | Paragraphs

trans-unit.resname: LTR·88 | Gríma Wormtongue | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Do not weary yourself, or tax too heavily your strength. Let others deal with these irksome guests."
trans-unit.target: 「请您千万别累着，或是过度消耗您的体力。就让下人来应付这些烦人的宾客吧。」

trans-unit.target: 践踏 只要是在你的回合中且你操控军队，CARDNAME便是神器生物。 搭载3（横置任意数量由你操控且力量总和等于或大于3的生物：此载具成为神器生物直到回合结束。）

trans-unit.resname: LTR·91 | Isildur's Fateful Strike | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Isildur cut the Ring from Sauron's hand with the hilt-shard of his father's sword, and Sauron himself was overthrown.
trans-unit.target: 伊熙尔杜用他父亲的断剑从索隆手上斩下魔戒，阻止了索隆的野心。

trans-unit.target: 牺牲一个生物或支付{4}，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用。 消灭目标生物。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·92 | Lash of the Balrog | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Even as the Balrog fell, it swung its whip, and the thongs lashed and curled about Gandalf's knees, dragging him to the brink of the abyss. "Fly, you fools!" he cried, and was gone.
trans-unit.target: 就当炎魔跌落时，它甩出鞭子，鞭梢直扑甘道夫而来，弯卷缠住了他的双膝，将他拉扯到深渊边缘。「快跑啊，你们这些傻瓜！」一声大喊过后，他随即消失不见。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·93 | Lobelia Sackville-Baggins | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 闪现 威慑 当CARDNAME进战场时，将目标生物牌从对手坟墓场放逐，且须为于本回合中从战场进入该处者，然后派出X个珍宝衍生物，X为所放逐之牌的力量。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·94 | March from the Black Gate | Flavor Text

trans-unit.target: 就像风暴一样，他们转眼之间便突破了刚铎人类的阵线。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·95 | Mirkwood Bats | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The enemy has many spies and many ways of hearing."\n—Gandalf

trans-unit.target: 结附于生物 所结附的生物得-3/-0且具有「在你的维持开始时，除非你支付2点生命，否则放逐此生物。」

trans-unit.resname: LTR·98 | Morgul-Knife Wound | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Frodo felt a pain like a dart of poisoned ice pierce his left shoulder.
trans-unit.target: 弗罗多感到左肩传来痛楚，有种被寒冰毒镖刺穿的感觉。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·99 | Nasty End | Card Name

trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.\nDraw two cards. If the sacrificed creature was legendary, draw three cards instead.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲一个生物，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用。 抓两张牌。如果所牺牲的生物是传奇，则改为抓三张牌。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·99 | Nasty End | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "And that's the end of that. A nasty end for Saruman, and I wish I needn't have seen it; but it's a good riddance."\n—Sam
trans-unit.target: 「那事这样就算结束了。萨茹曼的下场真惨，我真希望没有看到那一幕；不过总算完了。」 ～山姆

trans-unit.source:
Deathtouch
When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, the Ring tempts you.
Whenever the Ring tempts you, put a +1/+1 counter on each Wraith you control.
A deck can have up to nine cards named CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 死触 当CARDNAME进战场时，魔戒引诱你。 每当魔戒引诱你时，在每个由你操控的鬼魂上各放置一个+1/+1指示物。 名称为CARDNAME的牌，在套牌中的数量能有至多九张。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·101 | Oath of the Grey Host | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Oath of the Grey Host
trans-unit.target: 灰色大军之誓

trans-unit.resname: LTR·101 | Oath of the Grey Host | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)
I — You and target opponent each create a Food token.
II — Each opponent loses 3 life. Create a Treasure token.
III — Create three tapped 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying.
trans-unit.target: （于此传纪进战场时及于你抓牌步骤后，加一个学问指示物。到III后牺牲之。） I — 你和目标对手各派出一个食品衍生物。 II — 每位对手各失去3点生命。你派出一个珍宝衍生物。 III — 派出三个已横置的1/1白色，具飞行异能的精怪衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·102 | One Ring to Rule Them All | Card Name
trans-unit.source: One Ring to Rule Them All
trans-unit.target: 至尊魔戒御余众

trans-unit.resname: LTR·102 | One Ring to Rule Them All | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)
I — The Ring tempts you, then each player mills cards equal to your Ring-bearer's power.
II — Destroy all nonlegendary creatures.
III — Each opponent loses 1 life for each creature card in that player's graveyard.
trans-unit.target: （于此传纪进战场时及于你抓牌步骤后，加一个学问指示物。到III后牺牲之。） I — 魔戒引诱你，然后每位牌手各磨若干牌，其数量等同于你持戒人的力量。 II — 消灭所有非传奇生物。 III — 对每位对手而言，该牌手坟墓场中每有一张生物牌，其便失去1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·103 | Orcish Bowmasters | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 闪现 当CARDNAME进战场和每当任一对手抓一张牌，且不是其于自己的每个抓牌步骤中所抓的第一张牌时，CARDNAME对任意一个目标造成1点伤害。然后囤兵半兽人1。

trans-unit.target: 选择系命或不灭。目标生物获得该异能直到回合结束。 囤兵半兽人1。（在一个由你操控的军队上放置一个+1/+1指示物。它也是半兽人。如果你未操控军队，则先派出一个0/0黑色半兽人／军队衍生生物。）

trans-unit.resname: LTR·105 | Sam's Desperate Rescue | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sam's Desperate Rescue
trans-unit.target: 山姆危急施救

trans-unit.resname: LTR·105 | Sam's Desperate Rescue | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. The Ring tempts you.
trans-unit.target: 将目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。魔戒引诱你。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·105 | Sam's Desperate Rescue | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "By all the signs, there's a large warrior loose, with an Elf-sword, and an axe as well maybe." Gorbag spat. Sam smiled grimly at this description of himself.
trans-unit.target: 「从所有的迹象看起来，有个大块头的战士跑掉了，带着精灵长剑，也许还有把斧头。」戈巴格吐了口痰。听着对方这么形容自己，山姆只能苦笑。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·106 | Sauron, the Necromancer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sauron, the Necromancer
trans-unit.target: 死灵法师索隆

trans-unit.resname: LTR·106 | Sauron, the Necromancer | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Menace\nWhenever CARDNAME attacks, exile target creature card from your graveyard. Create a tapped and attacking token that's a copy of that card, except it's a 3/3 black Wraith with menace. At the beginning of the next end step, exile that token unless Sauron is your Ring-bearer.
trans-unit.target: 威慑 每当CARDNAME攻击时，将目标生物牌从你的坟墓场放逐。派出一个已横置且正进行攻击的衍生物，此衍生物为该牌的复制品，但它是3/3黑色，具威慑异能的鬼魂。在下一个结束步骤开始时，除非索隆是你的持戒人，否则放逐该衍生物。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·107 | Shadow of the Enemy | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Shadow of the Enemy
trans-unit.target: 邪敌阴影

trans-unit.resname: LTR·107 | Shadow of the Enemy | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Exile all creature cards from target player's graveyard. You may cast spells from among those cards for as long as they remain exiled, and mana of any type can be spent to cast them.
trans-unit.target: 放逐目标牌手坟墓场中的所有生物牌。于这些牌持续放逐的时段内，你可以从这些牌之中施放咒语，且能用任意种类的法术力来施放。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·107 | Shadow of the Enemy | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: As Frodo put on the Ring, Sauron was suddenly aware of the magnitude of his own folly. His wrath blazed in consuming flame, but his fear rose like black smoke.
trans-unit.target: 弗罗多戴上魔戒后，索隆突然知晓自己到底有多么愚不可及。他的怒火爆发成熊熊烈焰，其恐惧也如黑烟高高升起。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·108 | Shelob's Ambush | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Shelob's Ambush
trans-unit.target: 希洛布突袭

trans-unit.resname: LTR·108 | Shelob's Ambush | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target creature gets +1/+2 and gains deathtouch until end of turn. Create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")
trans-unit.target: 直到回合结束，目标生物得+1/+2且获得死触异能。派出一个食品衍生物。（它是具有「{2}，{T}，牺牲此神器：你获得3点生命」的神器。）

trans-unit.resname: LTR·108 | Shelob's Ambush | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: As Frodo ran forward, eager, rejoicing to be free, Shelob with hideous speed came behind and stung him in the neck.
trans-unit.target: 正当弗罗多心中满是重获自由的喜悦，急切地向前狂奔时，希洛布以可怕的速度从后面跟上，一刺正中他的脖颈。

trans-unit.target: 威慑（此生物只能被两个或更多生物阻挡。） 只要你操控鬼怪或半兽人，CARDNAME便得+1/+0。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·109 | Snarling Warg | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: A shuddering howl broke from him, as if he were a captain summoning his pack to the assault.
trans-unit.target: 他突然发出一声骇人吼叫，仿佛是领队呼唤狼群准备进攻。

trans-unit.source: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card.\nAmass Orcs 2. (Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. It's also an Orc. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Orc Army creature token first.)
trans-unit.target: 目标对手展示其手牌。你选择其中一张非地牌。该牌手弃掉该牌。 囤兵半兽人2。（在一个由你操控的军队上放置两个+1/+1指示物。它也是半兽人。如果你未操控军队，则先派出一个0/0黑色半兽人／军队衍生生物。）

trans-unit.resname: LTR·110 | The Torment of Gollum | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: In Mordor, all that he knew was forced from him.
trans-unit.target: 在魔多，他被迫透露出了所知的一切。

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can't be blocked except by three or more creatures.\nSwampcycling {1} ({1}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Swamp card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME只能被三个或更多生物阻挡。 循环沼泽{1}（{1}，弃掉此牌：从你牌库中搜寻一张沼泽牌，展示该牌，将它置于你手上，然后洗牌。）

trans-unit.resname: LTR·111 | Troll of Khazad-dûm | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "A great cave-troll, I think. There is no hope of escape that way."\n—Gandalf
trans-unit.target: 「我想，那是头巨大的洞穴食人妖。走那条路绝无逃生希望。」 ～甘道夫

trans-unit.resname: LTR·112 | Uruk-hai Berserker | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Uruk-hai Berserker
trans-unit.target: 乌鲁克族狂战士

trans-unit.resname: LTR·112 | Uruk-hai Berserker | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, the Ring tempts you.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，魔戒引诱你。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·112 | Uruk-hai Berserker | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "What of the dawn? We are the Uruk-hai; we do not stop the fight for night or day, for fair weather or for storm. We come to kill, by sun or moon. What of the dawn?"
trans-unit.target: 「黎明破晓又怎样？我们是乌鲁克族；我们很能打仗，不管黑夜白天，不管晴天风暴。我们很能杀人，不管太阳月亮。黎明破晓又怎样？」

trans-unit.source:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)
I — Amass Orcs 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. It's also an Orc. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Orc Army creature token first.)
II — Amass Orcs 2.
III — Creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain menace until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: （于此传纪进战场时及于你抓牌步骤后，加一个学问指示物。到III后牺牲之。） I — 囤兵半兽人1。（在一个由你操控的军队上放置一个+1/+1指示物。它也是半兽人。如果你未操控军队，则先派出一个0/0黑色半兽人／军队衍生生物。） I — 囤兵半兽人2。 III — 直到回合结束，由你操控的生物得+1/+0且获得威慑异能。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·117 | Breaking of the Fellowship | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "It might have been mine. It should be mine. Give it to me!"
trans-unit.target: 「它本来有可能是我的。它应该是我的。把它给我！」

trans-unit.target: 选择一项～ •CARDNAME对至多两个目标生物各造成1点伤害。 •放逐目标神器。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·118 | Cast into the Fire | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "But for Gollum, I could not have destroyed the Ring. So let us forgive him! For the Quest is achieved, and now all is over."\n—Frodo
trans-unit.target: 「要不是咕噜，我可能都没法毁掉魔戒。让我们原谅他吧！任务已完成，一切都结束了。」 ～弗罗多

trans-unit.resname: LTR·119 | Display of Power | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The Nazgûl closed round at night, and I was besieged. Such light and flame cannot have been seen on Weathertop since the war-beacons of old."\n—Gandalf
trans-unit.target: 「到了晚上，那兹古尔便将我团团围住。自从古代战争烽烟以来，风云顶上就再没见过此等光亮与火焰。」 ～甘道夫

trans-unit.resname: LTR·121 | Éomer of the Riddermark | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: But northward the white crest of Éomer led the great front of the Rohirrim which he had again gathered and marshaled.
trans-unit.target: 但在北边，伊梅奥尔重新集结起了洛希尔人，他们在国王白色马尾盔冠的率领下形成一道强壮锋线。

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, amass Orcs 2. When you do, until end of turn, gain control of target nonlegendary creature an opponent controls with power less than or equal to the amassed Army's power. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.

trans-unit.resname: LTR·135 | Haradrim Spearmaster | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "In the South the Haradrim are moving, and fear has fallen on all our coastlands."\n—Hirgon, errand-rider of Gondor

trans-unit.resname: LTR·136 | Hew the Entwood | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Sacrifice any number of lands. Reveal the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of lands sacrificed this way. Choose any number of artifact and/or land cards revealed this way. Put all nonland cards chosen this way onto the battlefield, then put all land cards chosen this way onto the battlefield tapped, then put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲任意数量的地。展示你牌库顶的X张牌，X为以此法牺牲的地数量。选择任意数量以此法展示的神器和／或地牌。将所有以此法选择的非地牌放进战场，然后将所有以此法选择的地牌横置放进战场，然后将其余的牌以随机顺序置于你牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·137 | Improvised Club | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "'For a couple o' pins,' says Troll, and grins, 'I'll eat thee too and gnaw thy shins.'"\n—Sam

trans-unit.resname: LTR·138 | Moria Marauder | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: There was a rush of hoarse laughter, like the fall of sliding stones into a pit; amid the clamor a deep voice was raised in command.

trans-unit.resname: LTR·142 | Rally at the Hornburg | Flavor Text

trans-unit.resname: LTR·151 | There and Back Again | Card Name
trans-unit.source: There and Back Again
trans-unit.target: 去而复返

trans-unit.resname: LTR·151 | There and Back Again | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)
I — Up to one target creature can't block for as long as you control CARDNAME. The Ring tempts you.
II — Search your library for a Mountain card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
III — Create Smaug, a legendary 6/6 red Dragon creature token with flying, haste, and "When this creature dies, create fourteen Treasure tokens."
trans-unit.target: （于此传纪进战场时及于你抓牌步骤后，加一个学问指示物。到III后牺牲之。） I — 于你操控CARDNAME的时段内，至多一个目标生物不能进行阻挡。魔戒引诱你。 II — 从你牌库中搜寻一张山脉牌，将之放进战场，然后洗牌。 III — 派出传奇衍生生物斯毛格，其为6/6红色的龙，且具有飞行、敏捷与「当此生物死去时，派出十四个珍宝衍生物。」

trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME或另一个由你操控且力量等于或大于4的生物死去时，囤兵半兽人2。（在一个由你操控的军队上放置两个+1/+1指示物。它也是半兽人。如果你未操控军队，则先派出一个0/0黑色半兽人／军队衍生生物。）

trans-unit.resname: LTR·154 | Bombadil's Song | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Hey dol! merry dol! ring a dong dillo!\nRing a dong! hop along! fal lal the willow!\nTom Bom, jolly Tom, Tom Bombadillo!"

trans-unit.resname: LTR·187 | Shortcut to Mushrooms | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, the Ring tempts you.\nAt the beginning of your end step, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，魔戒引诱你。 在你的结束步骤开始时，若本回合中有由你操控的永久物离开战场，则在目标由你操控的生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·188 | Shower of Arrows | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Shower of Arrows
trans-unit.target: 箭雨倾盆

trans-unit.resname: LTR·188 | Shower of Arrows | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or creature with flying. Scry 1.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标神器，结界或具飞行异能的生物。占卜1。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·188 | Shower of Arrows | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I wish there were more of your kin among us, Gimli. But even more would I give for a hundred good archers of Mirkwood. We shall need them."\n—Legolas
trans-unit.target: 「吉姆利，虽然我希望能有更多你的族人与我们并肩作战。但我现在更希望能有来自黑森林的一百名弓箭好手。我们需要他们。」 ～莱戈拉斯

trans-unit.resname: LTR·189 | Stew the Coneys | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Stew the Coneys
trans-unit.target: 炖煮兔子

trans-unit.resname: LTR·189 | Stew the Coneys | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control. Create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")
trans-unit.target: 目标由你操控的生物对目标不由你操控的生物造成伤害，其数量等同于前者的力量。派出一个食品衍生物。（它是具有「{2}，{T}，牺牲此神器：你获得3点生命」的神器。）

trans-unit.resname: LTR·189 | Stew the Coneys | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Stew the rabbits?" squealed Gollum in dismay. "Spoil beautiful meat Sméagol saved saved for you, poor hungry Sméagol! What for?"
trans-unit.target: 「炖兔子？」咕噜错愕地尖叫道。「糟蹋斯密戈留给你们的好肉，可怜的斯密戈饿肚子！为什么？」

trans-unit.resname: LTR·190 | Wose Pathfinder | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Wose Pathfinder
trans-unit.target: 寻路野人

trans-unit.resname: LTR·190 | Wose Pathfinder | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add one mana of any color.\n{6}{G}, {T}: Another target creature gets +3/+3 and gains trample until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加一点任意颜色的法术力。 {6}{G}，{T}：直到回合结束，另一个目标生物得+3/+3且获得践踏异能。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·190 | Wose Pathfinder | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Road is forgotten, but not by Wild Folk. Over hill and behind hill it lies still under grass and tree. Wild Folk will show you that road."
trans-unit.target: 「虽然众人忘记了路，但野人没忘。翻过山后，那路仍在山下，只是被草地跟树丛盖住了。野人会带你走那条路。」

trans-unit.resname: LTR·191 | Aragorn, Company Leader | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Aragorn, Company Leader
trans-unit.target: 远征队长阿拉贡

trans-unit.resname: LTR·191 | Aragorn, Company Leader | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever the Ring tempts you, if you chose a creature other than CARDNAME as your Ring-bearer, put your choice of a counter from among first strike, vigilance, deathtouch, and lifelink on Aragorn.\nWhenever you put one or more counters on Aragorn, put one of each of those kinds of counters on up to one other target creature.
trans-unit.target: 每当魔戒引诱你时，若你选择CARDNAME以外的生物作你的持戒人，则在阿拉贡上依你的选择放置一个先攻，警戒，死触或系命指示物。 每当你在阿拉贡上放置一个或数个指示物时，选择至多另一个目标生物。将所放置的指示物每种各在该生物上放置一个。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·192 | Aragorn, the Uniter | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Aragorn, the Uniter
trans-unit.target: 重联君王阿拉贡

trans-unit.resname: LTR·192 | Aragorn, the Uniter | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
Whenever you cast a white spell, create a 1/1 white Human Soldier creature token.
Whenever you cast a blue spell, scry 2.
Whenever you cast a red spell, CARDNAME deals 3 damage to target opponent.
Whenever you cast a green spell, target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放白色咒语时，派出一个1/1白色人类／士兵衍生生物。 每当你施放蓝色咒语时，占卜2。 每当你施放红色咒语时，CARDNAME向目标对手造成3点伤害。 每当你施放绿色咒语时，目标生物得+4/+4直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·193 | Arwen, Mortal Queen | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Arwen, Mortal Queen
trans-unit.target: 归凡皇后阿尔玟

trans-unit.resname: LTR·193 | Arwen, Mortal Queen | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield with an indestructible counter on it.\n{1}, Remove an indestructible counter from Arwen: Another target creature gains indestructible until end of turn. Put a +1/+1 counter and a lifelink counter on that creature and a +1/+1 counter and a lifelink counter on Arwen.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME进战场时上面有一个不灭指示物。 {1}，从阿尔玟上移去一个不灭指示物：另一个目标生物获得不灭异能直到回合结束。在该生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物和一个系命指示物，并在阿尔玟上放置一个+1/+1指示物和一个系命指示物。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·194 | Arwen Undómiel | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Arwen Undómiel
trans-unit.target: 阿尔玟·乌多米尔

trans-unit.resname: LTR·194 | Arwen Undómiel | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever you scry, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.\n{4}{G}{U}: Scry 2.
trans-unit.target: 每当你占卜时，在目标生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。 {4}{G}{U}：占卜2。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·194 | Arwen Undómiel | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: She was called Undómiel, for she was the Evenstar of her people.
trans-unit.target: 她又被称为乌多米尔，因她是她族人的暮星。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·195 | The Balrog, Durin's Bane | Card Name
trans-unit.source: The Balrog, Durin's Bane
trans-unit.target: 都林克星炎魔

trans-unit.resname: LTR·195 | The Balrog, Durin's Bane | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each permanent sacrificed this turn.
Haste
CARDNAME can't be blocked except by legendary creatures.
When The Balrog dies, destroy target artifact or creature an opponent controls.
trans-unit.target: 本回合中每牺牲过一个永久物，此咒语便减少{1}来施放。 敏捷 CARDNAME只能被传奇生物阻挡。 当炎魔死去时，消灭目标由对手操控的神器或生物。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·196 | Bilbo, Retired Burglar | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Bilbo, Retired Burglar
trans-unit.target: 退休小偷比尔博

trans-unit.resname: LTR·196 | Bilbo, Retired Burglar | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters or leaves the battlefield, the Ring tempts you.\nWhenever Bilbo deals combat damage to a player, create a Treasure token.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进入或离开战场时，魔戒引诱你。 每当比尔博对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，派出一个珍宝衍生物。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·196 | Bilbo, Retired Burglar | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I don't know half of you half as well as I should like; and I like less than half of you half as well as you deserve."
trans-unit.target: 「你们当中有一半人，我了解你们的程度还没有我了解喜欢人程度的一半；而你们当中少于一半人，我喜欢你们的程度也只有你们值得程度的一半。」

trans-unit.resname: LTR·197 | Butterbur, Bree Innkeeper | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Butterbur, Bree Innkeeper
trans-unit.target: 布理客栈老板黄油菊

trans-unit.resname: LTR·197 | Butterbur, Bree Innkeeper | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, if you don't control a Food, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")
trans-unit.target: 在你的结束步骤开始时，若你未操控食品，则派出一个食品衍生物。（它是具有「{2}，{T}，牺牲此神器：你获得3点生命」的神器。）

trans-unit.resname: LTR·197 | Butterbur, Bree Innkeeper | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I hope you'll be comfortable. You'll be wanting supper, I don't doubt. As soon as may be. This way now!"
trans-unit.target: 「我希望你们住得舒服。你们一定想吃晚饭了吧。这就尽快送上。现请这边走！」

trans-unit.resname: LTR·198 | Denethor, Ruling Steward | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Denethor, Ruling Steward
trans-unit.target: 执政宰相德内梭尔

trans-unit.resname: LTR·198 | Denethor, Ruling Steward | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, if a creature died under your control this turn, create a 1/1 white Human Soldier creature token.\n{2}, Sacrifice another creature: Each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 在你的结束步骤开始时，若本回合中有生物在你的操控下死去，则派出一个1/1白色人类／士兵衍生生物。 {2}，牺牲另一个生物：每位对手各失去1点生命且你获得1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·198 | Denethor, Ruling Steward | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Much must be risked in war."
trans-unit.target: 「战争中必须冒很多险。」

trans-unit.resname: LTR·199 | Doors of Durin | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Doors of Durin
trans-unit.target: 都林之门

trans-unit.resname: LTR·199 | Doors of Durin | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you attack, scry 2, then you may reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, put it onto the battlefield tapped and attacking. Until your next turn, it gains trample if you control a Dwarf and hexproof if you control an Elf.
trans-unit.target: 每当你攻击时，占卜2，然后你可以展示你的牌库顶牌。若它是生物牌，则将它横置放进战场，且正进行攻击。直到你的下一个回合，如果你操控矮人，则它获得践踏异能；如果你操控妖精，则它获得辟邪异能。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·199 | Doors of Durin | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Speak, friend, and enter."
trans-unit.target: 「请说，朋友，然后进入。」

trans-unit.resname: LTR·200 | Elrond, Master of Healing | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Elrond, Master of Healing
trans-unit.target: 疗伤圣手埃尔隆德

trans-unit.resname: LTR·200 | Elrond, Master of Healing | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever you scry, put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to X target creatures, where X is the number of cards looked at while scrying this way.\nWhenever a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, you may draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当你占卜时，在至多X个目标生物上各放置一个+1/+1指示物，X为以此法占卜期间所检视的牌张数量。 每当一个由你操控且其上有+1/+1指示物的生物成为由对手操控之咒语或异能的目标时，你可以抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·201 | Éowyn, Fearless Knight | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Éowyn, Fearless Knight
trans-unit.target: 无畏骑士伊奥温

trans-unit.resname: LTR·201 | Éowyn, Fearless Knight | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Haste\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls with greater power. Legendary creatures you control gain protection from each of that creature's colors until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 敏捷 当CARDNAME进战场时，放逐目标由对手操控且力量比它大的生物。每个由你操控的传奇生物均获得反所放逐生物之各色的保护异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·201 | Éowyn, Fearless Knight | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Am I not of the House of Eorl? I have waited on faltering feet long enough."
trans-unit.target: 「难道我不是埃奥尔家族的一员吗？我已经迟疑着等得足够久了。」

trans-unit.resname: LTR·202 | Faramir, Prince of Ithilien | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Faramir, Prince of Ithilien
trans-unit.target: 伊希利恩亲王法拉米尔

trans-unit.resname: LTR·202 | Faramir, Prince of Ithilien | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, choose an opponent. At the beginning of that player's next end step, you draw a card if they didn't attack you that turn. Otherwise, create three 1/1 white Human Soldier creature tokens.
trans-unit.target: 在你的结束步骤开始时，选择一位对手。在该牌手的下一个结束步骤开始时，如果其于该回合中未攻击你，则你抓一张牌。若否，则你派出三个1/1白色人类／士兵衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·202 | Faramir, Prince of Ithilien | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The City was made more fair than it had ever been, even in the days of its first glory.
trans-unit.target: 白城增建得比它首度全盛时期还要美丽。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·203 | Flame of Anor | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Flame of Anor
trans-unit.target: 阿诺尔之火

trans-unit.resname: LTR·203 | Flame of Anor | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
Choose one. If you control a Wizard as you cast this spell, you may choose two instead.
• Target player draws two cards.
• Destroy target artifact.
• CARDNAME deals 5 damage to target creature.
trans-unit.target: 选择一项。如果你于施放此咒语时操控法术师，则改为你可以选择两项。 •目标牌手抓两张牌。 •消灭目标神器。 •CARDNAME对目标生物造成5点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·203 | Flame of Anor | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: There was a ringing clash and a stab of white fire, and the Balrog fell back.
trans-unit.target: 两剑交击发出脆响，迸出白焰，炎魔向后跌去。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·204 | Friendly Rivalry | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Friendly Rivalry
trans-unit.target: 亦敌亦友

trans-unit.resname: LTR·204 | Friendly Rivalry | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target creature you control and up to one other target legendary creature you control each deal damage equal to their power to target creature you don't control.
trans-unit.target: 目标由你操控的生物与至多另一个目标由你操控的传奇生物各依其力量对目标不由你操控的生物造成伤害。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·204 | Friendly Rivalry | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Forty-two, Master Legolas!"\n—Gimli
trans-unit.target: 「四十二个，莱戈拉斯大人！」 ～吉姆利

trans-unit.resname: LTR·205 | Frodo Baggins | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Frodo Baggins
trans-unit.target: 弗罗多·巴金斯

trans-unit.resname: LTR·205 | Frodo Baggins | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME or another legendary creature enters the battlefield under your control, the Ring tempts you.\nAs long as Frodo is your Ring-bearer, it must be blocked if able.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME或另一个传奇生物在你的操控下进战场时，魔戒引诱你。 只要弗罗多是你的持戒人，则若能阻挡它，便必须阻挡之。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·205 | Frodo Baggins | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Few have ever come hither through greater peril or on an errand more urgent."\n—Elrond
trans-unit.target: 「来过这里的人当中，处境之艰险或任务之急迫更有甚于他的，寥寥无几。」 ～埃尔隆德

trans-unit.resname: LTR·206 | Galadriel of Lothlórien | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Galadriel of Lothlórien
trans-unit.target: 洛丝罗瑞恩的加拉德瑞尔

trans-unit.resname: LTR·206 | Galadriel of Lothlórien | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever the Ring tempts you, if you chose a creature other than CARDNAME as your Ring-bearer, scry 3.\nWhenever you scry, you may reveal the top card of your library. If a land card is revealed this way, put it onto the battlefield tapped.
trans-unit.target: 每当魔戒引诱你时，若你选择CARDNAME以外之生物作你的持戒人，则占卜3。 每当你占卜时，你可以展示牌库顶牌。如果以此法展示出一张地牌，则将它横置放进战场。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·206 | Galadriel of Lothlórien | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I pass the test. I will diminish, and go into the West, and remain Galadriel."
trans-unit.target: 「我通过了考验。我将衰微，前往西方，我仍是加拉德瑞尔。」

trans-unit.resname: LTR·207 | Gandalf the Grey | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Gandalf the Grey
trans-unit.target: 灰袍甘道夫

trans-unit.resname: LTR·207 | Gandalf the Grey | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, choose one that hasn't been chosen —
• You may tap or untap target permanent.
• CARDNAME deals 3 damage to each opponent.
• Copy target instant or sorcery spell you control. You may choose new targets for the copy.
• Put Gandalf on top of its owner's library.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放瞬间或法术咒语时，选择一项，且不得是此前选过的～ •你可以横置或重置目标永久物。 •CARDNAME向每位对手各造成3点伤害。 •复制目标由你操控的瞬间或法术咒语。你可以为该复制品选择新的目标。 •将甘道夫置于其拥有者的牌库顶。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·208 | Gandalf's Sanction | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Gandalf's Sanction
trans-unit.target: 甘道夫之罚

trans-unit.resname: LTR·208 | Gandalf's Sanction | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals X damage to target creature, where X is the number of instant and sorcery cards in your graveyard. Excess damage is dealt to that creature's controller instead.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对目标生物造成X点伤害，X为你坟墓场中瞬间和法术牌的数量加总。过量伤害改为对该生物的操控者造成之。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·208 | Gandalf's Sanction | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: There was a crack, and the staff split asunder in Saruman's hand, and the head of it fell down at Gandalf's feet.
trans-unit.target: 但听一声裂响，那根手杖在萨茹曼手中碎裂开来，杖头掉到了甘道夫脚前。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·209 | Gimli, Mournful Avenger | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Gimli, Mournful Avenger
trans-unit.target: 悲恸复仇者吉姆利

trans-unit.resname: LTR·209 | Gimli, Mournful Avenger | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME has indestructible as long as two or more creatures died under your control this turn.\nWhenever another creature you control dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Gimli. When this ability resolves for the third time this turn, Gimli fights up to one target creature you don't control.
trans-unit.target: 只要本回合中有两个或更多生物在你的操控下死去，CARDNAME便具有不灭异能。 每当另一个由你操控的生物死去时，在吉姆利上放置一个+1/+1指示物。当此异能本回合中第三次结算时，吉姆利与至多一个目标不由你操控的生物互斗。

trans-unit.source: Gwaihir the Windlord
trans-unit.target: 风王格怀希尔

trans-unit.resname: LTR·210 | Gwaihir the Windlord | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: This spell costs {2} less to cast as long as you've drawn two or more cards this turn.\nFlying, vigilance\nOther Birds you control have vigilance.
trans-unit.target: 只要你本回合中已抓两张或更多牌，此咒语便减少{2}来施放。 飞行，警戒 由你操控的其他鸟具有警戒异能。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·210 | Gwaihir the Windlord | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: There came Gwaihir the Windlord, greatest of all the Eagles of the North, mightiest of the descendants of old Thorondor.
trans-unit.target: 风王格怀希尔来了。他是北方大鹰中的最伟大者，老梭隆多最强大的后裔。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·211 | King of the Oathbreakers | Card Name
trans-unit.source: King of the Oathbreakers

trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever CARDNAME or another Spirit you control becomes the target of a spell, it phases out. (Treat it and anything attached to it as though they don't exist until your next turn.)\nWhenever CARDNAME or another Spirit you control phases in, create a tapped 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当CARDNAME或另一个由你操控的精怪成为咒语的目标时，令它跃离。（直到你的下一个回合，它及贴附于其上的所有东西都视作不存在。） 每当CARDNAME或另一个由你操控的精怪跃回时，派出一个已横置的1/1白色，具飞行异能的精怪衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·212 | Legolas, Counter of Kills | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Legolas, Counter of Kills
trans-unit.target: 争功莱戈拉斯

trans-unit.resname: LTR·212 | Legolas, Counter of Kills | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Reach\nWhenever you scry, if CARDNAME is tapped, you may untap it. Do this only once each turn.\nWhenever a creature an opponent controls dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Legolas.
trans-unit.target: 延势 每当你占卜时，若CARDNAME已横置，则你可以将它重置。每回合只能如此作一次。 每当一个由对手操控的生物死去时，在莱戈拉斯上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·212 | Legolas, Counter of Kills | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Two?" said Legolas. "I make my tale twenty at the least."
trans-unit.target: 「两个？」莱戈拉斯说，「我最起码有二十个进账。」

trans-unit.resname: LTR·213 | Lotho, Corrupt Shirriff | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Lotho, Corrupt Shirriff
trans-unit.target: 贪污夏警洛索

trans-unit.resname: LTR·213 | Lotho, Corrupt Shirriff | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a player casts their second spell each turn, you lose 1 life and create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
trans-unit.target: 每当任一牌手施放每回合中其第二个咒语时，你失去1点生命并派出一个珍宝衍生物。（它是具有「{T}，牺牲此神器：加一点任意颜色的法术力」的神器。）

trans-unit.resname: LTR·213 | Lotho, Corrupt Shirriff | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Whatever is wrong in the Shire, Lotho will be at the bottom of it: you can be sure of that."\n—Pippin
trans-unit.target: 「不管夏尔出了什么事，罪魁祸首一定是洛索：这点你可以确定。」 ～皮平

trans-unit.resname: LTR·214 | Mauhúr, Uruk-hai Captain | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mauhúr, Uruk-hai Captain
trans-unit.target: 乌鲁克族队长毛胡尔

trans-unit.resname: LTR·214 | Mauhúr, Uruk-hai Captain | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Menace\nIf one or more +1/+1 counters would be put on an Army, Goblin, or Orc you control, that many plus one +1/+1 counters are put on it instead.
trans-unit.target: 威慑 如果将在某个由你操控的军队，鬼怪或半兽人上放置一个或数个+1/+1指示物，则改为在其上放置该数量加一的+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·214 | Mauhúr, Uruk-hai Captain | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "We are the servants of Saruman the Wise, the White Hand: the Hand that gives us Man's-flesh to eat."
trans-unit.target: 「我们是白手智者萨茹曼的仆人，这手给我们人肉吃。」

trans-unit.resname: LTR·215 | Merry, Esquire of Rohan | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Merry, Esquire of Rohan
trans-unit.target: 洛汗侍从梅里

trans-unit.resname: LTR·215 | Merry, Esquire of Rohan | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Haste\nCARDNAME has first strike as long as it's equipped.\nWhenever you attack with Merry and another legendary creature, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 敏捷 只要CARDNAME佩带武具，它便具有先攻异能。 每当你以梅里和另一个传奇生物攻击时，抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·215 | Merry, Esquire of Rohan | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Then suddenly Merry felt it at last, beyond doubt: a change. Wind was in his face!
trans-unit.target: 突然间，梅里终于感觉到了，毫无疑问：变化已至。风吹在他脸上！

trans-unit.resname: LTR·216 | The Mouth of Sauron | Card Name
trans-unit.source: The Mouth of Sauron
trans-unit.target: 索隆之口

trans-unit.resname: LTR·216 | The Mouth of Sauron | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, target player mills three cards. Then amass Orcs X, where X is the number of instant and sorcery cards in that player's graveyard. (Put X +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. It's also an Orc. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Orc Army creature token first.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，目标牌手磨三张牌。然后囤兵半兽人X，X为该牌手坟墓场中瞬间与法术牌的数量加总。（在一个由你操控的军队上放置X个+1/+1指示物。它也是半兽人。如果你未操控军队，则先派出一个0/0黑色半兽人／军队衍生生物。）

trans-unit.resname: LTR·217 | Old Man Willow | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Old Man Willow
trans-unit.target: 柳树老头儿

trans-unit.resname: LTR·217 | Old Man Willow | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME's power and toughness are each equal to the number of lands you control.\nWhenever CARDNAME attacks, you may sacrifice another creature or a token. When you do, target creature an opponent controls gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME的力量和防御力各等同于由你操控的地数量。 每当CARDNAME攻击时，你可以牺牲另一个生物或一个衍生物。当你如此作时，目标由对手操控的生物得-2/-2直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·218 | Pippin, Guard of the Citadel | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Pippin, Guard of the Citadel
trans-unit.target: 王城守卫皮平

trans-unit.resname: LTR·218 | Pippin, Guard of the Citadel | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Vigilance, ward {1}\n{T}: Another target creature you control gains protection from the card type of your choice until end of turn. (It can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything of that type.)
trans-unit.target: 警戒，守护{1} {T}：选择一种牌张类别。另一个目标由你操控的生物获得反该牌张类别保护异能直到回合结束。（它不能被该类别的东西阻挡、指定为目标、造成伤害、结附或是装备。）

trans-unit.resname: LTR·218 | Pippin, Guard of the Citadel | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Here do I swear fealty to Gondor, until my lord release me, or death take me."
trans-unit.target: 「自此刻起，我将效忠刚铎，直到我主解除我的义务，或死亡降临。谨誓。」

trans-unit.resname: LTR·219 | Prince Imrahil the Fair | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Prince Imrahil the Fair
trans-unit.target: 英俊的伊姆拉希尔亲王

trans-unit.resname: LTR·219 | Prince Imrahil the Fair | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you draw your second card each turn, create a 1/1 white Human Soldier creature token.
trans-unit.target: 每当你抓每回合中你的第二张牌时，派出一个1/1白色人类／士兵衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·219 | Prince Imrahil the Fair | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The Lord Aragorn I hold to be my liege lord, whether he claim it or no. His wish is to me a command."
trans-unit.target: 「无论阿拉贡大人宣称与否，我都视他为我的主君。他的期盼于我就是命令。」

trans-unit.resname: LTR·220 | Ringsight | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ringsight
trans-unit.target: 魔戒迷影

trans-unit.resname: LTR·220 | Ringsight | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: The Ring tempts you. Search your library for a card that shares a color with a legendary creature you control, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: 魔戒引诱你。从你的牌库中搜寻一张与某个由你操控的传奇生物具共通颜色的牌，展示该牌，将它置于你手上，然后洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·220 | Ringsight | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Frodo was able to see beneath their black wrappings. In their white faces burned keen and merciless eyes.
trans-unit.target: 弗罗多看得透包裹他们的黑衣。苍白脸庞上的残忍双眼明亮锐利。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·221 | Rise of the Witch-king | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Rise of the Witch-king
trans-unit.target: 巫王崛起

trans-unit.resname: LTR·221 | Rise of the Witch-king | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each player sacrifices a creature. If you sacrificed a creature this way, you may return another permanent card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 每位牌手各牺牲一个生物。如果你以此法牺牲一个生物，则你可以将另一张永久物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·221 | Rise of the Witch-king | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: In rode the Lord of the Nazgûl, under the archway that no enemy ever yet had passed, and all fled before his face.
trans-unit.target: 那兹古尔之首逼上前来，立在那迄今从未有敌人穿过的拱道下，当者无不奔逃。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·222 | Samwise Gamgee | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 山姆怀斯·甘姆吉

trans-unit.resname: LTR·222 | Samwise Gamgee | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever another nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")\nSacrifice three Foods: Return target historic card from your graveyard to your hand. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)
trans-unit.target: 每当另一个非衍生物的生物在你的操控下进战场时，派出一个食品衍生物。（它是具有「{2}，{T}，牺牲此神器：你获得3点生命」的神器。） 牺牲三个食品：将目标史迹牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。（神器、传奇和传纪是史迹。）

trans-unit.resname: LTR·223 | Saruman of Many Colors | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Ward—\nDiscard an enchantment, instant, or sorcery card.\nWhenever you cast your second spell each turn, each opponent mills two cards. When one or more cards are milled this way, exile target enchantment, instant, or sorcery card with equal or lesser mana value than that spell from an opponent's graveyard. Copy the exiled card. You may cast the copy without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 守护～弃一张结界，瞬间或法术牌。 每当你施放每回合中你的第二个咒语时，每位对手各磨两张牌。当以此法磨掉一张或数张牌时，将目标法术力值等于或小于该咒语的结界，瞬间或法术牌从对手的坟墓场中放逐。复制所放逐的牌。你可以施放该复制品，且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·224 | Sauron, the Dark Lord | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sauron, the Dark Lord
trans-unit.target: 黑暗魔君索隆

trans-unit.resname: LTR·224 | Sauron, the Dark Lord | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
Ward—
Sacrifice a legendary artifact or legendary creature.
Whenever an opponent casts a spell, amass Orcs 1.
Whenever an Army you control deals combat damage to a player, the Ring tempts you.
Whenever the Ring tempts you, you may discard your hand. If you do, draw four cards.
trans-unit.target: 守护～牺牲一个传奇神器或传奇生物。 每当任一对手施放咒语时，囤兵半兽人1。 每当一个由你操控的军队对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，魔戒引诱你。 每当魔戒引诱你时，你可以弃掉你的手牌。若你如此作，则抓四张牌。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·225 | Sauron's Ransom | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sauron's Ransom
trans-unit.target: 索隆勒索

trans-unit.resname: LTR·225 | Sauron's Ransom | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Choose an opponent. They look at the top four cards of your library and separate them into a face-down pile and a face-up pile. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard. The Ring tempts you.
trans-unit.target: 选择一位对手。该牌手检视你牌库顶的四张牌，并分成牌面朝下与牌面朝上各一堆。你将其中一堆置于你手上，另一堆则置入你的坟墓场。魔戒引诱你。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·225 | Sauron's Ransom | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "He was dear to you, I see. And now he shall endure the slow torment of years."
trans-unit.target: 「我看得出来，他曾是对你很重要的人。现在他将受到长年累月的缓慢折磨。」

trans-unit.resname: LTR·226 | Shadow Summoning | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Shadow Summoning
trans-unit.target: 阴影召唤

trans-unit.resname: LTR·226 | Shadow Summoning | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Create two tapped 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying.
trans-unit.target: 派出两个已横置的1/1白色，具飞行异能的精怪衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·226 | Shadow Summoning | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Whose shall the horn be? Who shall call them from the grey twilight, the forgotten people? The heir of him to whom the oath they swore."\n—Malbeth the Seer
trans-unit.target: 「谁在鸣号？惨淡微光中 谁将被遗忘之人唤醒？ 乃誓言所托者的后裔。」 ～先知瑁贝斯

trans-unit.resname: LTR·227 | Shadowfax, Lord of Horses | Card Name

trans-unit.source: Horses you control have haste. (They can attack and {T} as soon as they come under your control.)\nWhenever CARDNAME attacks, you may put a creature card with lesser power from your hand onto the battlefield tapped and attacking.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的马具有敏捷异能。（它们受你操控时便能攻击与{T}。） 每当CARDNAME攻击时，你可以将一张力量比它小的生物牌从你手上横置放进战场，且正进行攻击。

If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Orc Army creature token first.)

trans-unit.source: Activated abilities of lands your opponents control can't be activated unless they're mana abilities.\nCARDNAME has all activated abilities of lands your opponents control except mana abilities.\nMana of any type can be spent to activate Sharkey's abilities.
trans-unit.target: 除了法术力异能之外，由对手操控之地的起动式异能都不能起动。 CARDNAME具有由对手操控之地的所有起动式异能，但法术力异能除外。 能用任意种类的法术力来起动沙基的异能。

Put that card onto the battlefield tapped under your control and the rest into their graveyard.

trans-unit.resname: LTR·232 | Strider, Ranger of the North | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The greatest traveler and huntsman of this age of the world.
trans-unit.target: 当今时代世上最伟大的旅者和猎人。

trans-unit.target: 洛汗国王希奥顿

trans-unit.resname: LTR·233 | Théoden, King of Rohan | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME or another Human enters the battlefield under your control, target creature gains double strike until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME或另一个人类在你的操控下进战场时，目标生物获得连击异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·233 | Théoden, King of Rohan | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Dark have been my dreams of late, but I feel new-awakened. I only fear that already you have come too late, Gandalf."
trans-unit.target: 「我最近的梦境总是一片黑暗，但我感觉自己像是大梦初醒。甘道夫，我只害怕你已经来得太迟了。」

trans-unit.resname: LTR·234 | Tom Bombadil | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 汤姆·邦巴迪尔

trans-unit.resname: LTR·234 | Tom Bombadil | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As long as there are four or more lore counters among Sagas you control, CARDNAME has hexproof and indestructible.\nWhenever the final chapter ability of a Saga you control resolves, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a Saga card. Put that card onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. This ability triggers only once each turn.
trans-unit.target: 只要由你操控的传纪上总共有四个或更多学问指示物，CARDNAME便具有辟邪与不灭异能。 每当一个由你操控的传纪之最终章节异能结算时，从你的牌库顶开始展示牌，直到展示出一张传纪牌为止。将该牌放进战场，其余则以随机顺序置于你的牌库底。此异能每回合只会触发一次。

trans-unit.target: 每当另一个由你操控的生物死去时，在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。若该生物是鬼怪或半兽人，则改为在乌格鲁克上放置两个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·235 | Uglúk of the White Hand | Flavor Text
