trans-unit.resname: LTR·238 | Ent-Draught Basin | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The effect of the draught began at the toes, and rose steadily through every limb, bringing refreshment and vigor as it coursed upward, right to the tips of the hair.
trans-unit.target: 饮料的效果先从脚趾开始，缓慢攀升到四肢，一路带去焕新感觉与激情活力，直达发梢。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·239 | Glamdring | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Glamdring
trans-unit.target: 格拉姆德凛

trans-unit.resname: LTR·239 | Glamdring | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Equipped creature has first strike and gets +1/+0 for each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard.\nWhenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, you may cast an instant or sorcery spell from your hand with mana value less than or equal to that damage without paying its mana cost.\nEquip {3}

trans-unit.resname: LTR·240 | Horn of Gondor | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Horn of Gondor
trans-unit.target: 刚铎之号

trans-unit.resname: LTR·240 | Horn of Gondor | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Human Soldier creature token.\n{3}, {T}: Create X 1/1 white Human Soldier creature tokens, where X is the number of Humans you control.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，派出一个1/1白色人类／士兵衍生生物。 {3}，{T}：派出X个1/1白色人类／士兵衍生生物，X为由你操控的人类数量。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·241 | Horn of the Mark | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 马克之号

trans-unit.resname: LTR·241 | Horn of the Mark | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever two or more creatures you control attack a player, look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
trans-unit.target: 每当由你操控的两个或更多生物攻击一位牌手时，检视你牌库顶的五张牌。你可以展示其中一张生物牌并置于你手上。将其余的牌以随机顺序置于你牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·241 | Horn of the Mark | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "He that blows this horn shall set fear in the hearts of his enemies and joy in the hearts of his friends."\n—Éowyn
trans-unit.target: 「吹响这号角，就能使敌人丧胆，友人振奋。」 ～伊奥温

trans-unit.resname: LTR·242 | Inherited Envelope | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Keep it secret, and keep it safe!"\n—Gandalf
trans-unit.target: 「将它秘藏，妥善保管！」 ～甘道夫

trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，占卜1，然后抓一张牌。 {2}，{T}，牺牲CARDNAME：你获得3点生命。 当CARDNAME从战场进入坟墓场时，其拥有者将它洗入其牌库。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·243 | Lembas | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: They could eat of it and find new strength even as they ran.
trans-unit.target: 这种食物他们可以边跑边吃，重续体力。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·244 | Mirror of Galadriel | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Your Quest stands upon the edge of a knife. Stray but a little and it will fail, to the ruin of all. Yet hope remains while all the Company is true."
trans-unit.target: 「你们的任务正在刀尖边缘。稍有差池便会失败，全盘尽毁。但只要远征队精诚团结，就还有希望。」

trans-unit.resname: LTR·246 | The One Ring | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
Indestructible
When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, if you cast it, you gain protection from everything until your next turn.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life for each burden counter on CARDNAME.
{T}: Put a burden counter on CARDNAME, then draw a card for each burden counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 不灭 当CARDNAME进战场时，若它经你施放，则你获得反一切保护异能直到你的下一个回合。 在你的维持开始时，CARDNAME上每有一个重负指示物，你便失去1点生命。 {T}：在CARDNAME上放置一个重负指示物，然后CARDNAME上每有一个重负指示物，便抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, put an influence counter on CARDNAME and scry 2. Then target opponent may have you draw a card. If that player doesn't, you mill X cards, where X is the number of influence counters on CARDNAME, and that player loses life equal to the total mana value of those cards.
trans-unit.target: 在你的结束步骤开始时，在CARDNAME上放置一个感化指示物并占卜2。然后目标对手可以令你抓一张牌。若该牌手未如此作，则你磨X张牌，X为CARDNAME上之感化指示物数量，且该牌手失去等同于这些牌法术力值总和的生命。

trans-unit.source: If you would draw a card while you have no cards in hand, draw two cards instead.\nIf you would gain life while you have 5 or less life, you gain twice that much life instead.\n{T}: Add one mana of any color.
trans-unit.target: 如果你将抓一张牌时手上没有牌，则改为抓两张牌。 如果你将获得生命时你的总生命为5或更少，则改为你获得该数量两倍的生命。 {T}：加一点任意颜色的法术力。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·248 | Phial of Galadriel | Flavor Text

trans-unit.target: 这时，原野彼端传来阵阵清晰有力的呼喝。只见一队骑兵奔驰而来：他们均是人类，身披铠甲，行动迅捷，装备闪亮，凶猛英俊。转眼间，他们便踏着雷鸣般蹄声来到面前，此时领头的骑手突然策马转向。

Otherwise, you draw a card and Gollum can't be blocked this turn.

trans-unit.source: Whenever one or more Halflings you control attack a player, create a Food token.
trans-unit.target: 每当由你操控的一个或数个半身人攻击一位牌手时，派出一个食品衍生物。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·315 | Peregrin Took | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Peregrin Took
trans-unit.target: 佩里格林·图克

trans-unit.resname: LTR·315 | Peregrin Took | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: If one or more tokens would be created under your control, those tokens plus an additional Food token are created instead.\nSacrifice three Foods: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 如果将在你的操控下派出一个或数个衍生物，则改为派出该些衍生物加上一个额外的食品衍生物。 牺牲三个食品：抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·316 | Aragorn, Company Leader | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Aragorn, Company Leader
trans-unit.target: 远征队长阿拉贡

trans-unit.resname: LTR·316 | Aragorn, Company Leader | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever the Ring tempts you, if you chose a creature other than CARDNAME as your Ring-bearer, put your choice of a counter from among first strike, vigilance, deathtouch, and lifelink on Aragorn.\nWhenever you put one or more counters on Aragorn, put one of each of those kinds of counters on up to one other target creature.
trans-unit.target: 每当魔戒引诱你时，若你选择CARDNAME以外的生物作你的持戒人，则在阿拉贡上依你的选择放置一个先攻，警戒，死触或系命指示物。 每当你在阿拉贡上放置一个或数个指示物时，选择至多另一个目标生物。将所放置的指示物每种各在该生物上放置一个。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·317 | Aragorn, the Uniter | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Aragorn, the Uniter
trans-unit.target: 重联君王阿拉贡

trans-unit.resname: LTR·317 | Aragorn, the Uniter | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
Whenever you cast a white spell, create a 1/1 white Human Soldier creature token.
Whenever you cast a blue spell, scry 2.
Whenever you cast a red spell, CARDNAME deals 3 damage to target opponent.
Whenever you cast a green spell, target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放白色咒语时，派出一个1/1白色人类／士兵衍生生物。 每当你施放蓝色咒语时，占卜2。 每当你施放红色咒语时，CARDNAME向目标对手造成3点伤害。 每当你施放绿色咒语时，目标生物得+4/+4直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·318 | Elrond, Master of Healing | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Elrond, Master of Healing
trans-unit.target: 疗伤圣手埃尔隆德

trans-unit.resname: LTR·318 | Elrond, Master of Healing | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever you scry, put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to X target creatures, where X is the number of cards looked at while scrying this way.\nWhenever a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, you may draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当你占卜时，在至多X个目标生物上各放置一个+1/+1指示物，X为以此法占卜期间所检视的牌张数量。 每当一个由你操控且其上有+1/+1指示物的生物成为由对手操控之咒语或异能的目标时，你可以抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·319 | Faramir, Prince of Ithilien | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Faramir, Prince of Ithilien
trans-unit.target: 伊希利恩亲王法拉米尔

trans-unit.resname: LTR·319 | Faramir, Prince of Ithilien | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, choose an opponent. At the beginning of that player's next end step, you draw a card if they didn't attack you that turn. Otherwise, create three 1/1 white Human Soldier creature tokens.
trans-unit.target: 在你的结束步骤开始时，选择一位对手。在该牌手的下一个结束步骤开始时，如果其于该回合中未攻击你，则你抓一张牌。若否，则你派出三个1/1白色人类／士兵衍生生物。

trans-unit.target: 弗罗多·巴金斯

trans-unit.resname: LTR·320 | Frodo Baggins | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME or another legendary creature enters the battlefield under your control, the Ring tempts you.\nAs long as Frodo is your Ring-bearer, it must be blocked if able.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME或另一个传奇生物在你的操控下进战场时，魔戒引诱你。 只要弗罗多是你的持戒人，则若能阻挡它，便必须阻挡之。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·321 | Galadriel of Lothlórien | Card Name

trans-unit.resname: LTR·321 | Galadriel of Lothlórien | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever the Ring tempts you, if you chose a creature other than CARDNAME as your Ring-bearer, scry 3.\nWhenever you scry, you may reveal the top card of your library. If a land card is revealed this way, put it onto the battlefield tapped.
trans-unit.target: 每当魔戒引诱你时，若你选择CARDNAME以外之生物作你的持戒人，则占卜3。 每当你占卜时，你可以展示牌库顶牌。如果以此法展示出一张地牌，则将它横置放进战场。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·322 | Gandalf the Grey | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Gandalf the Grey
trans-unit.target: 灰袍甘道夫

trans-unit.resname: LTR·322 | Gandalf the Grey | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, choose one that hasn't been chosen —
• You may tap or untap target permanent.
• CARDNAME deals 3 damage to each opponent.
• Copy target instant or sorcery spell you control. You may choose new targets for the copy.
• Put Gandalf on top of its owner's library.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放瞬间或法术咒语时，选择一项，且不得是此前选过的～ •你可以横置或重置目标永久物。 •CARDNAME向每位对手各造成3点伤害。 •复制目标由你操控的瞬间或法术咒语。你可以为该复制品选择新的目标。 •将甘道夫置于其拥有者的牌库顶。

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME has indestructible as long as two or more creatures died under your control this turn.\nWhenever another creature you control dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Gimli. When this ability resolves for the third time this turn, Gimli fights up to one target creature you don't control.
trans-unit.target: 只要本回合中有两个或更多生物在你的操控下死去，CARDNAME便具有不灭异能。 每当另一个由你操控的生物死去时，在吉姆利上放置一个+1/+1指示物。当此异能本回合中第三次结算时，吉姆利与至多一个目标不由你操控的生物互斗。

You may cast the copy without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 守护～弃一张结界，瞬间或法术牌。 每当你施放每回合中你的第二个咒语时，每位对手各磨两张牌。当以此法磨掉一张或数张牌时，将目标法术力值等于或小于该咒语的结界，瞬间或法术牌从对手的坟墓场中放逐。复制所放逐的牌。你可以施放该复制品，且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.target: 夏尔

trans-unit.resname: LTR·345 | The Shire | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a legendary creature.\n{T}: Add {G}.\n{1}{G}, {T}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Create a Food token.
trans-unit.target: 除非你操控传奇生物，否则CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {T}：加{G}。 {1}{G}，{T}，横置一个由你操控且未横置的生物：派出一个食品衍生物。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·346 | The Battle of Bywater | Card Name
trans-unit.source: The Battle of Bywater
trans-unit.target: 傍水镇之战

trans-unit.resname: LTR·346 | The Battle of Bywater | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy all creatures with power 3 or greater. Then create a Food token for each creature you control.
trans-unit.target: 消灭所有力量等于或大于3的生物。然后你每操控一个生物，便派出一个食品衍生物。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·346 | The Battle of Bywater | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The Tooks marched in with Pippin at their head. Merry now had enough sturdy Hobbitry to deal with the ruffians.
trans-unit.target: 图克家的人全都跟着皮平来到镇上。于是梅里就有了足够的霍比特壮汉来对付恶棍。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·347 | Dawn of a New Age | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Dawn of a New Age
trans-unit.target: 新纪元的曙光

trans-unit.resname: LTR·347 | Dawn of a New Age | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield with a hope counter on it for each creature you control.\nAt the beginning of your end step, remove a hope counter from CARDNAME. If you do, draw a card. Then if CARDNAME has no hope counters on it, sacrifice it and you gain 4 life.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME进战场时上面有数个希望指示物，其数量等同于由你操控的生物数量。 在你的结束步骤开始时，从CARDNAME上移去一个希望指示物。若你如此作，则抓一张牌。然后如果CARDNAME上没有希望指示物，则将它牺牲且你获得4点生命。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·348 | Flowering of the White Tree | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Flowering of the White Tree
trans-unit.target: 白树开花

trans-unit.resname: LTR·348 | Flowering of the White Tree | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Legendary creatures you control get +2/+1 and have ward {1}.\nNonlegendary creatures you control get +1/+1.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的传奇生物得+2/+1且具有守护{1}。 由你操控的非传奇生物得+1/+1。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·348 | Flowering of the White Tree | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Aragorn planted the new tree in the court by the fountain, and swiftly and gladly it began to grow.
trans-unit.target: 阿拉贡将新树种在王庭喷泉边，于是它便欢快地迅速生长。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·349 | Forge Anew | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Forge Anew
trans-unit.target: 重铸一新

trans-unit.resname: LTR·349 | Forge Anew | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, return target Equipment card from your graveyard to the battlefield.\nAs long as it's your turn, you may activate equip abilities any time you could cast an instant.\nYou may pay {0} rather than pay the equip cost of the first equip ability you activate during each of your turns.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，将目标武具牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。 只要是在你的回合中，你便可以于你能够施放瞬间的时机下起动佩带异能。 对你于你的每个回合中首度起动的佩带异能而言，你可以支付{0}，而不支付其佩带费用。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·350 | Borne Upon a Wind | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Borne Upon a Wind
trans-unit.target: 乘风而行

trans-unit.resname: LTR·350 | Borne Upon a Wind | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: You may cast spells this turn as though they had flash.\nDraw a card.
trans-unit.target: 本回合中，你可以将咒语视同具有闪现异能地来施放。 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·350 | Borne Upon a Wind | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I looked on Aragorn and thought how great and terrible a Lord he might have become, had he taken the Ring for himself. Not for naught does Mordor fear him."\n—Legolas
trans-unit.target: 「我看着阿拉贡，心想如果当初他把魔戒占为己有，会变成怎样一位强大又可怕的君王。魔多怕他不是没理由的。」 ～莱戈拉斯

trans-unit.resname: LTR·351 | Goldberry, River-Daughter | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Goldberry, River-Daughter
trans-unit.target: 河之女金莓

trans-unit.resname: LTR·351 | Goldberry, River-Daughter | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Move a counter of each kind not on CARDNAME from another target permanent you control onto Goldberry.\n{U}, {T}: Move one or more counters from Goldberry onto another target permanent you control. If you do, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: {T}：选择另一个目标由你操控的永久物。将该永久物上CARDNAME没有的指示物每种各从该处移一个到金莓上。 {U}，{T}：将一个或数个指示物从金莓移到另一个目标由你操控的永久物上。若你如此作，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·351 | Goldberry, River-Daughter | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Fear nothing! For tonight you are under the roof of Tom Bombadil."
trans-unit.target: 「什么都不用怕！因为今晚你们来到了汤姆·邦巴迪尔的家。」

trans-unit.resname: LTR·352 | Press the Enemy | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Press the Enemy
trans-unit.target: 压制敌军

trans-unit.resname: LTR·352 | Press the Enemy | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Return target spell or nonland permanent an opponent controls to its owner's hand. You may cast an instant or sorcery spell with equal or lesser mana value from your hand without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 将目标由对手操控的咒语或非地永久物移回其拥有者手上。你可以从你手上施放一个法术力值相等或较小的瞬间或法术咒语，且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·352 | Press the Enemy | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I showed the blade reforged to him. He is not so mighty yet that he is above fear."
trans-unit.target: 「我向他展示了重铸的剑。他还没有强大到无所畏惧。」

trans-unit.resname: LTR·353 | Rangers of Ithilien | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Rangers of Ithilien
trans-unit.target: 伊希利恩突击队

trans-unit.resname: LTR·353 | Rangers of Ithilien | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Vigilance\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, gain control of up to one target creature with lesser power for as long as you control CARDNAME. Then the Ring tempts you.
trans-unit.target: 警戒 当CARDNAME进战场时，于你操控CARDNAME的时段内，获得至多一个目标力量比它小的生物之操控权。然后魔戒引诱你。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·353 | Rangers of Ithilien | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "We have a new errand on this journey: to ambush the Men of Harad."
trans-unit.target: 「我们此行有新使命：伏击哈拉德的人类。」

trans-unit.resname: LTR·354 | The Watcher in the Water | Card Name
trans-unit.source: The Watcher in the Water
trans-unit.target: 水中的监视者

trans-unit.resname: LTR·354 | The Watcher in the Water | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped with nine stun counters on it.\nWhenever you draw a card during an opponent's turn, create a 1/1 blue Tentacle creature token.\nWhenever a Tentacle you control dies, untap up to one target Kraken and put a stun counter on up to one target nonland permanent.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场，且上面有九个晕眩指示物。 每当你在对手的回合中抓一张牌时，派出一个1/1蓝色触手衍生生物。 每当一个由你操控的触手死去时，重置至多一个目标巨海兽，并在至多一个目标非地永久物上放置一个晕眩指示物。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·355 | Call of the Ring | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Call of the Ring
trans-unit.target: 魔戒呼唤

trans-unit.resname: LTR·355 | Call of the Ring | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, the Ring tempts you.\nWhenever you choose a creature as your Ring-bearer, you may pay 2 life. If you do, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，魔戒引诱你。 每当你选择一个生物作你的持戒人时，你可以支付2点生命。若你如此作，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·355 | Call of the Ring | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The Ring is mine!"
trans-unit.target: 「魔戒是我的！」

trans-unit.resname: LTR·356 | Isildur's Fateful Strike | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Isildur's Fateful Strike
trans-unit.target: 伊熙尔杜宿命挥斩

trans-unit.resname: LTR·356 | Isildur's Fateful Strike | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: (You may cast a legendary instant only if you control a legendary creature or planeswalker.)\nDestroy target creature. If its controller has more than four cards in hand, they exile cards from their hand equal to the difference.
trans-unit.target: （只能于你操控传奇生物或传奇鹏洛客时施放传奇瞬间。） 消灭目标生物。如果其操控者的手牌数量多于四张，则该牌手从其手上放逐等同于该差距数量的牌。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·356 | Isildur's Fateful Strike | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Isildur cut the Ring from Sauron's hand with the hilt-shard of his father's sword, and Sauron himself was overthrown.
trans-unit.target: 伊熙尔杜用他父亲的断剑从索隆手上斩下魔戒，阻止了索隆的野心。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·357 | Lobelia Sackville-Baggins | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Lobelia Sackville-Baggins
trans-unit.target: 洛比莉亚·萨克维尔巴金斯

trans-unit.resname: LTR·357 | Lobelia Sackville-Baggins | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flash\nMenace\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, exile target creature card from an opponent's graveyard that was put there from the battlefield this turn, then create X Treasure tokens, where X is the exiled card's power.
trans-unit.target: 闪现 威慑 当CARDNAME进战场时，将目标生物牌从对手坟墓场放逐，且须为于本回合中从战场进入该处者，然后派出X个珍宝衍生物，X为所放逐之牌的力量。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·358 | Display of Power | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Display of Power
trans-unit.target: 展现力量

trans-unit.resname: LTR·358 | Display of Power | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: This spell can't be copied.\nCopy any number of target instant and/or sorcery spells. You may choose new targets for the copies.
trans-unit.target: 此咒语不能被复制。 复制任意数量的目标瞬间和／或法术咒语。你可以为每个复制品选择新的目标。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·358 | Display of Power | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The Nazgûl closed round at night, and I was besieged. Such light and flame cannot have been seen on Weathertop since the war-beacons of old."\n—Gandalf
trans-unit.target: 「到了晚上，那兹古尔便将我团团围住。自从古代战争烽烟以来，风云顶上就再没见过此等光亮与火焰。」 ～甘道夫

trans-unit.resname: LTR·359 | Fall of Cair Andros | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Fall of Cair Andros
trans-unit.target: 凯尔安德洛斯陷落

trans-unit.resname: LTR·359 | Fall of Cair Andros | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature an opponent controls is dealt excess noncombat damage, amass Orcs X, where X is that excess damage.\n{7}{R}: CARDNAME deals 7 damage to target creature.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由对手操控的生物受到过量之非战斗伤害时，囤兵半兽人X，X为该过量伤害之数值。 {7}{R}：CARDNAME对目标生物造成7点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·360 | Glóin, Dwarf Emissary | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Glóin, Dwarf Emissary
trans-unit.target: 矮人特使格罗因

trans-unit.resname: LTR·360 | Glóin, Dwarf Emissary | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a historic spell, create a Treasure token. This ability triggers only once each turn.\n{T}, Sacrifice a Treasure: Goad target creature.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放史迹咒语时，派出一个珍宝衍生物。此异能每回合只会触发一次。 {T}，牺牲一个珍宝：煽惑目标生物。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·361 | Hew the Entwood | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Hew the Entwood
trans-unit.target: 滥伐恩特森林

trans-unit.resname: LTR·361 | Hew the Entwood | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Sacrifice any number of lands. Reveal the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of lands sacrificed this way. Choose any number of artifact and/or land cards revealed this way. Put all nonland cards chosen this way onto the battlefield, then put all land cards chosen this way onto the battlefield tapped, then put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲任意数量的地。展示你牌库顶的X张牌，X为以此法牺牲的地数量。选择任意数量以此法展示的神器和／或地牌。将所有以此法选择的非地牌放进战场，然后将所有以此法选择的地牌横置放进战场，然后将其余的牌以随机顺序置于你牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·362 | Moria Marauder | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Moria Marauder
trans-unit.target: 墨瑞亚劫掠者

trans-unit.resname: LTR·362 | Moria Marauder | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Double strike\nWhenever a Goblin or Orc you control deals combat damage to a player, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn.
trans-unit.target: 连击 每当一个由你操控的鬼怪或半兽人对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，放逐你的牌库顶牌。本回合中，你可以使用该牌。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·362 | Moria Marauder | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: There was a rush of hoarse laughter, like the fall of sliding stones into a pit; amid the clamor a deep voice was raised in command.
trans-unit.target: 突然有阵像是滚石滑入坑底的嘶哑笑声传来；之后喧嚣之中发出深沉低语，有人开始发号施令。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·363 | Delighted Halfling | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Delighted Halfling
trans-unit.target: 快乐的半身人

trans-unit.resname: LTR·363 | Delighted Halfling | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {C}.\n{T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast a legendary spell, and that spell can't be countered.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{C}。 {T}：加一点任意颜色的法术力。此法术力只能用来施放传奇咒语，且该咒语不能被反击。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·363 | Delighted Halfling | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: There were toys the Hobbit-children had never seen before, all beautiful, and some obviously magical.
trans-unit.target: 霍比特小孩从来没有见过这种玩具：它们全都很精美，有些很明显带有魔法。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·364 | Elven Chorus | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Elven Chorus
trans-unit.target: 精灵齐颂

trans-unit.resname: LTR·364 | Elven Chorus | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: You may look at the top card of your library any time.\nYou may cast creature spells from the top of your library.\nCreatures you control have "{T}: Add one mana of any color."
trans-unit.target: 你可以随时检视你的牌库顶牌。 你可以从你的牌库顶施放生物咒语。 由你操控的生物具有「{T}：加一点任意颜色的法术力。」

trans-unit.resname: LTR·364 | Elven Chorus | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "A Elbereth Gilthoniel, silivren penna míriel o menel aglar elenath!"
trans-unit.target: 「A Elbereth Gilthoniel, silivren penna míriel o menel aglar elenath!」

trans-unit.resname: LTR·365 | Radagast the Brown | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Radagast the Brown
trans-unit.target: 褐袍拉达加斯特

trans-unit.resname: LTR·365 | Radagast the Brown | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME or another nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, look at the top X cards of your library, where X is that creature's mana value. You may reveal a creature card that doesn't share a creature type with a creature you control from among those cards and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME或另一个非衍生物的生物在你的操控下进战场时，检视你牌库顶的X张牌，X为该生物的法术力值。你可以展示其中一张与由你操控之生物不具共通生物类别的生物牌并置于你手上。将其余的牌以随机顺序置于你牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·366 | The Ring Goes South | Card Name
trans-unit.source: The Ring Goes South
trans-unit.target: 魔戒南去

trans-unit.resname: LTR·366 | The Ring Goes South | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: The Ring tempts you. Then reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal X land cards, where X is the number of legendary creatures you control. Put those land cards onto the battlefield tapped and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
trans-unit.target: 魔戒引诱你。然后从你的牌库顶开始展示牌，直到展示出X张地牌为止，X为由你操控的传奇生物数量。将这些地牌横置放进战场，其余则以随机顺序置于你的牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·367 | Arwen, Mortal Queen | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Arwen, Mortal Queen
trans-unit.target: 归凡皇后阿尔玟

trans-unit.resname: LTR·367 | Arwen, Mortal Queen | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield with an indestructible counter on it.\n{1}, Remove an indestructible counter from Arwen: Another target creature gains indestructible until end of turn. Put a +1/+1 counter and a lifelink counter on that creature and a +1/+1 counter and a lifelink counter on Arwen.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME进战场时上面有一个不灭指示物。 {1}，从阿尔玟上移去一个不灭指示物：另一个目标生物获得不灭异能直到回合结束。在该生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物和一个系命指示物，并在阿尔玟上放置一个+1/+1指示物和一个系命指示物。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·368 | Doors of Durin | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Doors of Durin
trans-unit.target: 都林之门

trans-unit.resname: LTR·368 | Doors of Durin | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you attack, scry 2, then you may reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, put it onto the battlefield tapped and attacking. Until your next turn, it gains trample if you control a Dwarf and hexproof if you control an Elf.
trans-unit.target: 每当你攻击时，占卜2，然后你可以展示你的牌库顶牌。若它是生物牌，则将它横置放进战场，且正进行攻击。直到你的下一个回合，如果你操控矮人，则它获得践踏异能；如果你操控妖精，则它获得辟邪异能。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·368 | Doors of Durin | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Speak, friend, and enter."
trans-unit.target: 「请说，朋友，然后进入。」

trans-unit.resname: LTR·369 | King of the Oathbreakers | Card Name
trans-unit.source: King of the Oathbreakers
trans-unit.target: 背誓者之王

trans-unit.resname: LTR·369 | King of the Oathbreakers | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever CARDNAME or another Spirit you control becomes the target of a spell, it phases out.\nWhenever CARDNAME or another Spirit you control phases in, create a tapped 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当CARDNAME或另一个由你操控的精怪成为咒语的目标时，令它跃离。 每当CARDNAME或另一个由你操控的精怪跃回时，派出一个已横置的1/1白色，具飞行异能的精怪衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·370 | Lotho, Corrupt Shirriff | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Lotho, Corrupt Shirriff
trans-unit.target: 贪污夏警洛索

trans-unit.resname: LTR·370 | Lotho, Corrupt Shirriff | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a player casts their second spell each turn, you lose 1 life and create a Treasure token.
trans-unit.target: 每当任一牌手施放每回合中其第二个咒语时，你失去1点生命并派出一个珍宝衍生物。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·370 | Lotho, Corrupt Shirriff | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Whatever is wrong in the Shire, Lotho will be at the bottom of it: you can be sure of that."\n—Pippin
trans-unit.target: 「不管夏尔出了什么事，罪魁祸首一定是洛索：这点你可以确定。」 ～皮平

trans-unit.resname: LTR·371 | Sauron's Ransom | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sauron's Ransom
trans-unit.target: 索隆勒索

trans-unit.resname: LTR·371 | Sauron's Ransom | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Choose an opponent. They look at the top four cards of your library and separate them into a face-down pile and a face-up pile. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard. The Ring tempts you.
trans-unit.target: 选择一位对手。该牌手检视你牌库顶的四张牌，并分成牌面朝下与牌面朝上各一堆。你将其中一堆置于你手上，另一堆则置入你的坟墓场。魔戒引诱你。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·371 | Sauron's Ransom | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "He was dear to you, I see. And now he shall endure the slow torment of years."
trans-unit.target: 「我看得出来，他曾是对你很重要的人。现在他将受到长年累月的缓慢折磨。」

trans-unit.resname: LTR·372 | Shagrat, Loot Bearer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Shagrat, Loot Bearer
trans-unit.target: 掠物加身沙格拉特

trans-unit.resname: LTR·372 | Shagrat, Loot Bearer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, attach up to one target Equipment to it. Then amass Orcs X, where X is the number of Equipment attached to Shagrat. (Control of the Equipment doesn't change.)

trans-unit.resname: LTR·440 | Rosie Cotton of South Lane | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Rosie Cotton of South Lane

trans-unit.resname: LTR·440 | Rosie Cotton of South Lane | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create a Food token.\nWhenever you create a token, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control other than Rosie.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，派出一个食品衍生物。 每当你派出一个衍生物时，在目标罗西以外由你操控的生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.source: Vigilance\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a token. When you do, exile target creature an opponent controls until CARDNAME leaves the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 警戒 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以牺牲一个衍生物。当你如此作时，放逐目标由对手操控的生物，直到CARDNAME离开战场为止。

trans-unit.source: Flash\nYou may cast legendary spells and artifact spells as though they had flash.\nIf a legendary permanent or an artifact entering or leaving the battlefield causes a triggered ability of a permanent you control to trigger, that ability triggers an additional time.
trans-unit.target: 闪现 你可以将传奇咒语和神器咒语视同具有闪现异能地来施放。 如果由你操控之永久物具有的触发式异能因传奇永久物或神器进入或离开战场而触发，则该异能额外触发一次。

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, scry 1.\n{T}: Add {C}.\n{T}: Add one mana of any color among legendary creature cards in your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，占卜1。 {T}：加{C}。 {T}：加一点法术力，其颜色为你坟墓场中传奇生物牌所具有的任一颜色。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·444 | Lost Isle Calling | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever you scry, put a verse counter on CARDNAME.\n{4}{U}{U}, Exile CARDNAME: Draw a card for each verse counter on CARDNAME. If it had seven or more verse counters on it, take an extra turn after this one. Activate only as a sorcery.
trans-unit.target: 每当你占卜时，在CARDNAME上放置一个词句指示物。 {4}{U}{U}，放逐CARDNAME：CARDNAME上每有一个词句指示物，便抓一张牌。如果其上有七个或更多词句指示物，则于本回合后进行额外的一个回合。只能于法术时机起动。

trans-unit.source: Whenever the Ring tempts you, if you chose a creature other than CARDNAME as your Ring-bearer, scry 3.\nWhenever you scry, you may reveal the top card of your library. If a land card is revealed this way, put it onto the battlefield tapped.
trans-unit.target: 每当魔戒引诱你时，若你选择CARDNAME以外之生物作你的持戒人，则占卜3。 每当你占卜时，你可以展示牌库顶牌。如果以此法展示出一张地牌，则将它横置放进战场。

trans-unit.source: Whenever you scry, put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to X target creatures, where X is the number of cards looked at while scrying this way.\nWhenever a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, you may draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当你占卜时，在至多X个目标生物上各放置一个+1/+1指示物，X为以此法占卜期间所检视的牌张数量。 每当一个由你操控且其上有+1/+1指示物的生物成为由对手操控之咒语或异能的目标时，你可以抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: {WB}{WB}: If CARDNAME is a Citizen, it becomes a Halfling Scout with base power and toughness 2/3 and lifelink.\n{B}{B}{B}: If Frodo is a Scout, it becomes a Halfling Rogue with "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player loses the game if the Ring has tempted you four or more times this game. Otherwise, the Ring tempts you."
trans-unit.target: {W/B}{W/B}：如果CARDNAME是市民，则它成为基础力量与防御力为2/3、具系命异能的半身人／斥候。 {B}{B}{B}：如果弗罗多是斥候，则它成为半身人／浪客，且具有「每当此生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，如果本盘游戏中魔戒已引诱你四次或更多，则该牌手输掉这盘游戏。若否，则魔戒引诱你。」

trans-unit.source: Flash\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, choose up to one target permanent card in your graveyard that was put there from the battlefield this turn. Return it to your hand. Then the Ring tempts you.
trans-unit.target: 闪现 当CARDNAME进战场时，选择至多一张目标在你坟墓场中的永久物牌，且须为于本回合中从战场进入该处者。将该牌移回你手上。然后魔戒引诱你。

trans-unit.source:
Indestructible
When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, if you cast it, you gain protection from everything until your next turn.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life for each burden counter on CARDNAME.
{T}: Put a burden counter on CARDNAME, then draw a card for each burden counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 不灭 当CARDNAME进战场时，若它经你施放，则你获得反一切保护异能直到你的下一个回合。 在你的维持开始时，CARDNAME上每有一个重负指示物，你便失去1点生命。 {T}：在CARDNAME上放置一个重负指示物，然后CARDNAME上每有一个重负指示物，便抓一张牌。
